MESSAGE.JP: 真っ黒な中に、小毬さんらしき押し付けたような顔が浮かび上がっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Amid a pitch black blot there was something that resembled Komari-san's squashed face.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝How should I say it, this is gross.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「なんていうか、キモいですネ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝How should I say it, this is gross.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝U, uwaaah! I'm gross!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「う、うわああーんっ!!　私がキモいーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝U, uwaaah! I'm gross!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I noticed that Komari-san's copies continued coming out.

MESSAGE.JP: 見れば、がーがーと何枚も小毬さんのコピーが生産されていた。
MESSAGE.EN: I noticed that Komari-san's copies continued coming out.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, didn't you make too many?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっと、コピーしすぎだよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, didn't you make too many?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ah, huh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「あ、ありゃ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ah, huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I pressed the cancel button to stop it from printing any more copies.

MESSAGE.JP: 取り消しボタンを押して、とりあえず印刷を止めた。
MESSAGE.EN: I pressed the cancel button to stop it from printing any more copies.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Oh, I forgot to change the number of copies...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「あ、枚数設定変えてなかったんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Oh, I forgot to change the number of copies...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Aah... You just wasted 14 copies...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ…１４枚も無駄にしちゃったじゃん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Aah... You just wasted 14 copies...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Oh, um... sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「あー、その、ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Oh, um... sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I'll get you a new card later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「今度新品と交換するからさ、そのカード」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I'll get you a new card later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You'd better...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「絶対だよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You'd better...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝But they have artistic value, so let's put them up all over school.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「とりあえずこれは芸術的だから、１４枚貼り合わせてどっかに掲示しときましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝But they have artistic value, so let's put them up all over school.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝The title is, 14 sheets of Komarin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「タイトルは、１４枚のこまりん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝The title is, 14 sheets of Komarin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Look, when you put them together like this, they're gro... artistic!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「ほら、こう並べるとキモ…アーティスティック！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Look, when you put them together like this, they're gro... artistic!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uueen, s-stop that～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うえーんっ、や、やめて～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uueen, s-stop that～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: What an odd pair they were.

MESSAGE.JP: なんか、でこぼこコンビだった。
MESSAGE.EN: What an odd pair they were.
MESSAGE.Translation: I turned the copy machine back on.

MESSAGE.JP: ひとまず、印刷を再開。
MESSAGE.EN: I turned the copy machine back on.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝～♪❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝～♪❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at Saigusa-san, who was humming while operating the copier, and started to doubt whether there was any meaning to this notification.

MESSAGE.JP: 鼻歌交じりに印刷をする三枝さんを見ていると、この印刷物もまったく意味がないんじゃないか、と思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at Saigusa-san, who was humming while operating the copier, and started to doubt whether there was any meaning to this notification.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Hey, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「ねぇ理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Hey, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Mm, what?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ん、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Mm, what?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I like the smell of freshly printed paper.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「印刷したての紙の匂いって妙に好きなんだよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I like the smell of freshly printed paper.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Soy beans are used to make soy ink. If you think of it, it's a tasty smell.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「ソイインクって大豆が原料なんだよねー。考えてみたら美味しい匂いだねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Soy beans are used to make soy ink. If you think of it, it's a tasty smell.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue～, really?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえ～、そうなんだー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue～, really?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: She was interested in something that had nothing to do with the actual purpose of the notification.

MESSAGE.JP: 本人は印刷物の意図とは関係ないことに興味を持っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: She was interested in something that had nothing to do with the actual purpose of the notification.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Mm, is something wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「ん、どうかした？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Mm, is something wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...It's nothing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なんでもないよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...It's nothing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝You're weird, Riki-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「変な理樹くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝You're weird, Riki-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I had a feeling that the one being strange was Saigusa-san, pressing the sheet of paper against her nose...

MESSAGE.JP: 変なのは紙に鼻を押し当ててる三枝さんの気もする…。
MESSAGE.EN: I had a feeling that the one being strange was Saigusa-san, pressing the sheet of paper against her nose...
MESSAGE.Translation: The copy machine gave a beep.

MESSAGE.JP: ぴぴ、とコピー機の音。
MESSAGE.EN: The copy machine gave a beep.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I'm done. Thanks to you both.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「終わったかな。二人とも、ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I'm done. Thanks to you both.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You're welcome.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どういたしまして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You're welcome.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, it's totally fine～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、ぜんぜんおっけーですよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, it's totally fine～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I took the card back from her and suddenly noticed something.

MESSAGE.JP: カードを受け取った僕はふと気がついて尋ねた。
MESSAGE.EN: I took the card back from her and suddenly noticed something.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You left your papers on the bench, Saigusa-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「作業台に紙、残ってるよ三枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You left your papers on the bench, Saigusa-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Mm, you can use them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「ん、使っていいよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Mm, you can use them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝There probably won't be enough paper.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「多分紙、足りなくなるだろうからね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝There probably won't be enough paper.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: As if her words were some kind of signal, the copier emitted a warning sound.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝さんの台詞が合図だったかのように、コピー機は警告音を出した。
MESSAGE.EN: As if her words were some kind of signal, the copier emitted a warning sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Oh... It stopped.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あ…止まっちゃったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Oh... It stopped.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝❛Please load paper❜? Ah, you're right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「紙を補充してください？　あ、ほんとだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝❛Please load paper❜? Ah, you're right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝I'll see you later, thanks for lending me the card～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「じゃあね、カード貸してくれてありがとう～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝I'll see you later, thanks for lending me the card～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, wait, Saigusa-san...! She's gone...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、ちょっと、三枝さん…！　行っちゃった…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, wait, Saigusa-san...! She's gone...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She had already disappeared before I could say anything else.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝さんを成す術もなく見送った僕。
MESSAGE.EN: She had already disappeared before I could say anything else.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Let's load the paper.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…補充しようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Let's load the paper.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Let me handle it～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「私やるよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Let me handle it～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝There's some left here too, let's put them together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「こっちの残ってるのも一緒に入れちゃうね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝There's some left here too, let's put them together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm, okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ん、おっけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm, okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She opened the paper tray, which was naturally empty.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんががしゃこん、とコピー機のトレイを開けると、用紙は当然のことながら、空だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She opened the paper tray, which was naturally empty.
MESSAGE.Translation: We adjusted the settings and resumed copying.

MESSAGE.JP: セットを終えると、印刷を再開する。
MESSAGE.EN: We adjusted the settings and resumed copying.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Guh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ぶっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Guh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The first thing that came out was a copy of Komari-san.

MESSAGE.JP: …初っ端、さっきの小毬さんのコピーが出てきた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The first thing that came out was a copy of Komari-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You mixed up the papers...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「紙、混じってるよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You mixed up the papers...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Aah, I, I got it all wrong～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ああっ、ま、まちがえた～っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Aah, I, I got it all wrong～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: It took 15 minutes to finish.

MESSAGE.JP: 全部刷り終わったのは、それから１５分後だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It took 15 minutes to finish.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Let's go back～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃ、もどろ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Let's go back～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She started walking, the copies held in her hands.

MESSAGE.JP: プリントを抱えて小毬さんが出ていく。
MESSAGE.EN: She started walking, the copies held in her hands.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's all right, I'll take them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いいよ、僕持つからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's all right, I'll take them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue? I'm fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえ？　平気だよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue? I'm fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Actually, I was the one asked to do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「一応僕も頼まれたんだしさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Actually, I was the one asked to do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Then, let's divide them in half.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃあ半分こにしようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Then, let's divide them in half.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She gave me half of the handouts and we returned to the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 半分のプリントを手渡されて、教室に戻った。
MESSAGE.EN: She gave me half of the handouts and we returned to the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うーん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I hesitated for a moment.

MESSAGE.JP: ちょっと悩んでいると。
MESSAGE.EN: I hesitated for a moment.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'll go then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃあ私行ってきますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'll go then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, Komari-san...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、小毬さん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, Komari-san...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝I see. Well, I think you can handle it by yourself, Kamikita-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `教師@「そうか。じゃあ、神北ひとりでもできるだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝I see. Well, I think you can handle it by yourself, Kamikita-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Understood～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「わかりましたー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Understood～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She took the handouts and the copy card from the teacher.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんは教師からプリントとコピーカードを受け取った。
MESSAGE.EN: She took the handouts and the copy card from the teacher.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝Copy both sides please.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `教師@「それじゃ両面刷りでよろしく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝Copy both sides please.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He went on ahead right away.

MESSAGE.JP: …足早に行ってしまった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He went on ahead right away.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Then, I'll be off～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃあ、私はちょっといってくるよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Then, I'll be off～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, I'll hel...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、僕も手伝…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, I'll hel...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝See you in the classroom～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃあ教室でねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝See you in the classroom～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She hurried away with light steps.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんも軽やかなステップで去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: She hurried away with light steps.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@(...She left before I could even offer to help...)

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@（…こっちが提案する前に行ってしまった…）
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@(...She left before I could even offer to help...)
MESSAGE.Translation: Well, can't be helped now...

MESSAGE.JP: まあ、しょうがないか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Well, can't be helped now...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm truly sorry, but I must wander around now, so I can't do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「私情で誠に申し訳ないのですが、これからさすらうので無理です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm truly sorry, but I must wander around now, so I can't do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Teacher@❝I see... I don't really get it, but you've got the eyes of a fighting man now, so there's no helping it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `教師@「そうか…よくわからんが戦う男の目つきになっているから、仕方があるまい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Teacher@❝I see... I don't really get it, but you've got the eyes of a fighting man now, so there's no helping it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Then, I can do it in a jiffy～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃあこっちはすぐやっておくよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Then, I can do it in a jiffy～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm sorry...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「すまないね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm sorry...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝No problem～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「のーぷろぶれむだよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝No problem～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She headed off to the copy room immediately.

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんは足早に印刷室へ向かっていった。
MESSAGE.EN: She headed off to the copy room immediately.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝However, the next time we meet it might be as enemies...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「けれど、次出会ったら敵同士かもしれない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝However, the next time we meet it might be as enemies...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: What an ironic fate.

MESSAGE.JP: 皮肉な運命だ。
MESSAGE.EN: What an ironic fate.
MESSAGE.Translation: All right... let's get going.

MESSAGE.JP: よし…いくか。
MESSAGE.EN: All right... let's get going.
MESSAGE.Translation: After our next class ended.

MESSAGE.JP: 移動教室の授業の終わり。
MESSAGE.EN: After our next class ended.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had been helping Masato, who was asked to clean up the instruments in the science classroom, and we were returning to our classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 理科室の器具の片付けを頼まれていた真人を手伝って、一緒にふたりで教室に戻る。
MESSAGE.EN: I had been helping Masato, who was asked to clean up the instruments in the science classroom, and we were returning to our classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Sorry, making you help me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「わりいな、付き合わせちまって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Sorry, making you help me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't sweat it. Besides, you helped me before as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「気にしないでいいよ。前に手伝ってもらったしさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't sweat it. Besides, you helped me before as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Every day, different students were randomly asked to clean up the labware.

MESSAGE.JP: 実験器具の片付けは、その日によって適当に指名された生徒が片付ける事になっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Every day, different students were randomly asked to clean up the labware.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student@❝Who in the world's done such a thing!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒@「誰だぁーっ、こんなことしたやつはぁーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student@❝Who in the world's done such a thing!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: A loud voice was coming from the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: 教室から声が響いてきた。
MESSAGE.EN: A loud voice was coming from the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...At the same time, someone leaped out into the hall.

MESSAGE.JP: …同時に、教室からひとり、飛び出してくる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...At the same time, someone leaped out into the hall.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝...Huh, Riki-kun and Masato-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「…ありゃ、理樹くんに真人くん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝...Huh, Riki-kun and Masato-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Ah, Saigusa, you little!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「あっ、三枝、てめえっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Ah, Saigusa, you little!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Oh my, I appeared at the wrong time again...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「ありゃりゃ、またまたまずいところに…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Oh my, I appeared at the wrong time again...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Did something happen again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…またなんかあったの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Did something happen again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yeah, listen up! She scribbled all over my physics handout! And with a ballpoint pen to boot!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ああ、聞け!!　こいつはなぁ、オレの物理のプリントに落書きしてったんだよっ!!　しかもボールペンでっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yeah, listen up! She scribbled all over my physics handout! And with a ballpoint pen to boot!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Well, it was just brought to me by the wind, so I was going to give it back...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「いやー、あれは風で飛んでたから、戻してあげようと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Well, it was just brought to me by the wind, so I was going to give it back...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So why'd you go and scribble on it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それでなんで落書きになるのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So why'd you go and scribble on it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Because not doing anything with it would go against my principles!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「だって何もしないのは私の主義に反するから！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Because not doing anything with it would go against my principles!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: What troublesome principles...

MESSAGE.JP: 厄介な主義だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: What troublesome principles...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You wrote a star symbol in the name field, and I had to turn it in with my name as ❛Masato ☆ Inohara❜

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「てめえが名前欄に☆と書きやがったせいで、オレは『井ノ原☆真人』って名前で提出するハメになったんだよぉーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You wrote a star symbol in the name field, and I had to turn it in with my name as ❛Masato ☆ Inohara❜
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Couldn't you have just used correction fluid?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「修正液使えばよかったじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Couldn't you have just used correction fluid?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uwooo! I never thought of that!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うおおぉぉおぉーっ！　その手があったあぁぁーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uwooo! I never thought of that!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Well now, that's how it is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「まーまー、そんな感じですネ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Well now, that's how it is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Setting that aside, what was the uproar in the classroom just now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それはおいといて、今の教室の騒ぎは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Setting that aside, what was the uproar in the classroom just now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Mm, today, the last episode of an interesting drama is being broadcast.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「ん、今日面白いドラマの最終回やるからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Mm, today, the last episode of an interesting drama is being broadcast.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, what was it? The Mystery.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あー、なんだっけ。ミステリーの」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, what was it? The Mystery.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝So, I wrote a small announcement on the blackboard, you see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「それの宣伝をちょっと黒板にね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝So, I wrote a small announcement on the blackboard, you see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student@❝Dammit! They ruined it by revealing the perpetrator!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒@「ちくしょうーっ!!　犯人わかっちまったら楽しさ激減じゃないかぁぁーー!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student@❝Dammit! They ruined it by revealing the perpetrator!!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: She did something stupid alright...

MESSAGE.JP: ろくでもないことするなぁ…。
MESSAGE.EN: She did something stupid alright...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝...Well, I was going to write what it was about for those who didn't know, but I got a bit too enthusiastic.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「…いやまあ、知らない人向けに内容も書いとこ☆　と思ったら、ちょっとノリノリになっちゃって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝...Well, I was going to write what it was about for those who didn't know, but I got a bit too enthusiastic.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Spoilers are a serious crime...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ネタバレは重罪だよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Spoilers are a serious crime...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Speaking of what was fun for students living in the dorm, the TV set in the recreation area of each floor would be number one on the list.

MESSAGE.JP: 寮生活の生徒の楽しみといえば、各階の娯楽室に設置されているテレビが一番だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Speaking of what was fun for students living in the dorm, the TV set in the recreation area of each floor would be number one on the list.
MESSAGE.Translation: We didn't watch it that often, but it seemed like the recreation area was always crowded with people.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らはあんまり見に行く事はないけど、娯楽室に入り浸りの生徒も結構多いらしい。
MESSAGE.EN: We didn't watch it that often, but it seemed like the recreation area was always crowded with people.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...One by one, students were coming out of the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: …と、どやどやと教室から生徒が出てきた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...One by one, students were coming out of the classroom.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student@❝There she is!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒@「いたぞっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student@❝There she is!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student@❝Saigusa! Was that you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒@「三枝っ!!　お前だろっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student@❝Saigusa! Was that you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ah, ahaha... It's a problem if you're that serious about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「あ、あはは…そこまで本気になられると困っちゃうナァ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ah, ahaha... It's a problem if you're that serious about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student@❝Why'd you do that!! It's been my reason for living lately!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒@「どうしてくれんだよっ!!　あれがここ最近の生きがいだったのにっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student@❝Why'd you do that!! It's been my reason for living lately!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Well, that's merely the ending I came up with myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「いやー、だってあれ私が考えた結末ですヨ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Well, that's merely the ending I came up with myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student@❝...Eh?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Student@❝...Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: The noisy atmosphere changed.

MESSAGE.JP: ざわめきの雰囲気が変わる。
MESSAGE.EN: The noisy atmosphere changed.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Well, it was such a realistic theory, it seems that everyone believed it!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「いやー、みんな信じちゃうくらいリアルな推理だったってことですナ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Well, it was such a realistic theory, it seems that everyone believed it!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student@❝A theory, you mean...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒@「推理って…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student@❝A theory, you mean...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝The reason I wrote all this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「あそこに書いた動機はですね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝The reason I wrote all this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She began explaining.

MESSAGE.JP: …三枝さんの解説が始まる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She began explaining.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝...Something like this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「…って感じかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝...Something like this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student@❝Hee...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒@「へぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student@❝Hee...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Voices of admiration were heard.

MESSAGE.JP: 感嘆の声が漏れる。
MESSAGE.EN: Voices of admiration were heard.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student@❝You're amazing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒@「おまえ、すごいな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student@❝You're amazing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Ahaha, praise me, praise me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「あはははもっと誉めてもっと誉めてっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Ahaha, praise me, praise me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student@❝But, there's a major flaw with your theory.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒@「いや、けどその推理には穴がある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student@❝But, there's a major flaw with your theory.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Oh? Would you tell me what it is?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「おお？　お聞かせ願いましょーかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Oh? Would you tell me what it is?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hang on, hang on...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ちょっとちょっと…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hang on, hang on...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Now it was turning into a debate.

MESSAGE.JP: その場で討論会が始まってしまっていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Now it was turning into a debate.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Everyone, keep the noise down, okay...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「みんな、あんまりこんなところで騒がしくしてちゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Everyone, keep the noise down, okay...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And.

MESSAGE.EN: ...And.
MESSAGE.Translation: At that very instant.

MESSAGE.JP: それは一瞬のことだった。
MESSAGE.EN: At that very instant.
MESSAGE.Translation: All the noise in the corridor suddenly died down.

MESSAGE.JP: ざわざわとしていた廊下はいきなり静まりかえった。
MESSAGE.EN: All the noise in the corridor suddenly died down.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student@❝Ah... Saigusa, let's talk about this later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒@「あ…三枝、話はまた今度な」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student@❝Ah... Saigusa, let's talk about this later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...All the students engaged in the discussion returned to the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: …話をしていた生徒たちも、教室へ戻っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...All the students engaged in the discussion returned to the classroom.

MESSAGE.Translation: *Tap*tap*tap*, light footsteps. And after that, the sound of a multitude of feet marching.

MESSAGE.JP: タッタッタ、と軽い靴音。その後をいくつもの靴音が追う。
MESSAGE.EN: *Tap*tap*tap*, light footsteps. And after that, the sound of a multitude of feet marching.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a group of students wearing armbands on their left arms.

MESSAGE.JP: 左腕に腕章をした生徒群。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a group of students wearing armbands on their left arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: Student council members, I first thought, but I was mistaken.

MESSAGE.JP: 生徒会かな、と思ったら違った。
MESSAGE.EN: Student council members, I first thought, but I was mistaken.
MESSAGE.Translation: The vivid crimson red armbands had ❛School Disciplinary Committee❜ written on them in white letters.

MESSAGE.JP: 鮮やかなクリムゾン・レッドの腕章には白字で『風紀委』。
MESSAGE.EN: The vivid crimson red armbands had ❛School Disciplinary Committee❜ written on them in white letters.
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝...matter go?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「…の件はどうなってたかしら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝...matter go?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Regarding that, we already have the student council's executive board's approval.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「それに関しては生徒会執行委員会の決裁待ちです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Regarding that, we already have the student council's executive board's approval.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝What about negotiations concerning the boys' dorm's head candidacy?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「男子寮長候補との折衝は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝What about negotiations concerning the boys' dorm's head candidacy?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝There don't appear to be any problems, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「特に問題は無さそうですが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝There don't appear to be any problems, but...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: The sound of footsteps stopped as though hitting a wall.

MESSAGE.JP: ぴたり、と靴音が止んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The sound of footsteps stopped as though hitting a wall.
MESSAGE.Translation: It really was that quick.

MESSAGE.JP: 本当に一瞬のことだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It really was that quick.
MESSAGE.Translation: The girl standing in the center of the group cast a glance at us.

MESSAGE.JP: 集団の真ん中に居た女子は、僕たちに向かって視線を投げた。
MESSAGE.EN: The girl standing in the center of the group cast a glance at us.
MESSAGE.Translation: But it really lasted just a fraction of a second, before she resumed her steps.

MESSAGE.JP: けれどそれはやっぱり一瞬で、彼女はそのまま歩き出す。
MESSAGE.EN: But it really lasted just a fraction of a second, before she resumed her steps.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝There aren't, but doing it right away might be problematic.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「無いのですが、早速トラブルが持ち込まれて――」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝There aren't, but doing it right away might be problematic.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: As the group disappeared around the corner, the usual noise returned to the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下の角にその集団が消えると、廊下はざわめきを取り戻した。
MESSAGE.EN: As the group disappeared around the corner, the usual noise returned to the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝...Hmph.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「…ふん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝...Hmph.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard Saigusa-san snort quietly next to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 隣で三枝さんが小さく鼻を鳴らすのが聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard Saigusa-san snort quietly next to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at my surroundings.

MESSAGE.JP: それに気がついた僕が隣を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at my surroundings.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝What are you spacing out for, Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「何ぼーっとしてるの、理樹くん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝What are you spacing out for, Riki-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Let's get back to class, come on, let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「私たちも教室入ろ、ほら、いこ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Let's get back to class, come on, let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Saigusa-san tugged at the sleeve of my uniform.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝さんは僕の制服の裾をくいくい、と引っ張った。
MESSAGE.EN: Saigusa-san tugged at the sleeve of my uniform.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y, yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y, yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She began to walk next to me, and looking at her, she had her usual carefree smile.

MESSAGE.JP: 歩き出した三枝さんの横顔はいつもどおりの脳天気な笑顔だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She began to walk next to me, and looking at her, she had her usual carefree smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝So, that thing we talked about before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「それでね、さっきの話なんだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝So, that thing we talked about before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Unfocused, I was just nodding my head while giving her an occasional half-hearted reply.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は三枝さんの話に適当な相槌を打ちながら、首を捻っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Unfocused, I was just nodding my head while giving her an occasional half-hearted reply.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And.

MESSAGE.EN: ...And.
MESSAGE.Translation: At that very instant.

MESSAGE.JP: それは一瞬のことだった。
MESSAGE.EN: At that very instant.
MESSAGE.Translation: All the noise in the corridor suddenly died down.

MESSAGE.JP: ざわざわとしていた廊下はいきなり静まりかえった。
MESSAGE.EN: All the noise in the corridor suddenly died down.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Student@❝Ah... Saigusa, let's talk about this later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `生徒@「あ…三枝、話はまた今度な」
MESSAGE.EN: `Student@❝Ah... Saigusa, let's talk about this later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...All the students engaged in the discussion returned to the classroom.

MESSAGE.JP: …話をしていた生徒たちも、教室へ戻っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...All the students engaged in the discussion returned to the classroom.

MESSAGE.Translation: *Tap*tap*tap*, light footsteps. And after that, the sound of a multitude of feet marching.

MESSAGE.JP: タッタッタ、と軽い靴音。その後をいくつもの靴音が追う。
MESSAGE.EN: *Tap*tap*tap*, light footsteps. And after that, the sound of a multitude of feet marching.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a group of students wearing armbands on their left arms.

MESSAGE.JP: 左腕に腕章をした生徒群。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a group of students wearing armbands on their left arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: Student council members, I first thought, but I was mistaken.

MESSAGE.JP: 生徒会かな、と思ったら違った。
MESSAGE.EN: Student council members, I first thought, but I was mistaken.
MESSAGE.Translation: The vivid crimson red armbands had ❛School Disciplinary Committee❜ written on them in white letters.

MESSAGE.JP: 鮮やかなクリムゾン・レッドの腕章には白字で『風紀委』。
MESSAGE.EN: The vivid crimson red armbands had ❛School Disciplinary Committee❜ written on them in white letters.
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝..That incident is over?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝..That incident is over?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Yes, it's over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「はい、終わりました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Yes, it's over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Good. Deal with the rest accordingly.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「そう。じゃあとは適当にやっておいてね」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Good. Deal with the rest accordingly.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Oh, right. I need you to find people for trash pick-up duty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「あぁ、そうだ。ごみ拾いの参加者を募集しといて」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Oh, right. I need you to find people for trash pick-up duty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Okay. When is it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「はい。日時は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Okay. When is it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Monday, before morning homeroom and after evening homeroom.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「月曜の朝のＨＲの前と、夕方のＨＲの後で」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Monday, before morning homeroom and after evening homeroom.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Understood. What should we do about the prank in the empty classroom?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「わかりました。空き教室のいたずらはどうしますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Understood. What should we do about the prank in the empty classroom?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝...Ah, the person stacking those desks? They must have a lot of free time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「…あぁ、机が積み重なってるやつ？　暇人がいるわよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝...Ah, the person stacking those desks? They must have a lot of free time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Yes... we've put them back for the time being, but should we search for the culprit?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「はぁ…一応直しておいたのですが…犯人捜しはいいんでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Yes... we've put them back for the time being, but should we search for the culprit?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝They haven't caused any real harm, so it's okay to just ignore them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「害がなさそうだし、放置しておけばいいでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝They haven't caused any real harm, so it's okay to just ignore them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝...It'd be a problem if you got involved.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「…関わるのもめんどいし」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝...It'd be a problem if you got involved.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝Did you say something, head prefect?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「委員長、何か言いました？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝Did you say something, head prefect?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝No, it was nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「いえ、別に。なんでもないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝No, it was nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: The sound of footsteps stopped as though hitting a wall.

MESSAGE.JP: ぴたり、と靴音が止んだ。
MESSAGE.EN: The sound of footsteps stopped as though hitting a wall.
MESSAGE.Translation: The girl standing in the center of the group cast a glance at us.

MESSAGE.JP: 集団の真ん中に居た女子は、僕たちに向かって視線を投げた。
MESSAGE.EN: The girl standing in the center of the group cast a glance at us.

MESSAGE.Translation: It seemed like she wanted to say something.

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女は何か物言いたげにも思えた。
MESSAGE.EN: It seemed like she wanted to say something.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could sense something in her gaze...

MESSAGE.JP: その視線に、僕は――。
MESSAGE.EN: I could sense something in her gaze...
MESSAGE.Translation: Her gaze was more of a stare.

MESSAGE.JP: 睨むようなその視線。
MESSAGE.EN: Her gaze was more of a stare.
MESSAGE.Translation: I don't know why, but she seemed to be looking at me with hostility...

MESSAGE.JP: どうしてかわからないけれど敵意を向けられているようだ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I don't know why, but she seemed to be looking at me with hostility...
MESSAGE.Translation: But it really lasted just a fraction of a second, before she resumed her steps.

MESSAGE.JP: けれどそれはやっぱり一瞬で、彼女はそのまま歩き出す。
MESSAGE.EN: But it really lasted just a fraction of a second, before she resumed her steps.
MESSAGE.Translation: As the group disappeared around the corner, the usual noise returned to the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下の角にその集団が消えると、廊下はざわめきを取り戻した。
MESSAGE.EN: As the group disappeared around the corner, the usual noise returned to the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝...Hmph.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「…ふん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝...Hmph.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I heard Saigusa-san snort quietly next to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 隣で三枝さんが小さく鼻を鳴らすのが聞こえた。
MESSAGE.EN: I heard Saigusa-san snort quietly next to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at my surroundings.

MESSAGE.JP: それに気がついた僕が隣を見る。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at my surroundings.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝What are you spacing out for, Riki-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「何ぼーっとしてるの、理樹くん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝What are you spacing out for, Riki-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Let's get back to class, come on, let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「私たちも教室入ろ、ほら、いこ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Let's get back to class, come on, let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Saigusa-san tugged at the sleeve of my uniform.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝さんは僕の制服の裾をくいくい、と引っ張った。
MESSAGE.EN: Saigusa-san tugged at the sleeve of my uniform.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Y, yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Y, yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She began to walk next to me, and looking at her, she had her usual carefree smile.

MESSAGE.JP: 歩き出した三枝さんの横顔はいつもどおりの脳天気な笑顔だった。
MESSAGE.EN: She began to walk next to me, and looking at her, she had her usual carefree smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝So, that thing we talked about before.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「それでね、さっきの話なんだけどね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝So, that thing we talked about before.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Unfocused, I was just nodding my head while giving her an occasional half-hearted reply.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は三枝さんの話に適当な相槌を打ちながら、首を捻っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Unfocused, I was just nodding my head while giving her an occasional half-hearted reply.
MESSAGE.Translation: It felt like I was being stared at.

MESSAGE.JP: 睨まれているような気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: It felt like I was being stared at.
MESSAGE.Translation: But isn't the atmosphere kind of gentle...?

MESSAGE.JP: けれどなんとなく雰囲気がやわらかいような…？
MESSAGE.EN: But isn't the atmosphere kind of gentle...?
MESSAGE.Translation: Like the scene before me could leave a lasting impression.

MESSAGE.JP: 目にした現実を記憶に残しておこうとでもするかのように。
MESSAGE.EN: Like the scene before me could leave a lasting impression.
MESSAGE.Translation: She kept looking at us.

MESSAGE.JP: じっと彼女は僕たちを見ている。
MESSAGE.EN: She kept looking at us.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Prefect 1@❝What's wrong, head prefect?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `風紀委員１@「どうしましたか、委員長？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Prefect 1@❝What's wrong, head prefect?❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Saigusa-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「三枝さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Saigusa-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I suddenly realized something.

MESSAGE.JP: ふと気がついた。
MESSAGE.EN: I suddenly realized something.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was looking at Saigusa-san, not me.

MESSAGE.JP: 彼女が見ているのは僕ではなく、三枝さんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She was looking at Saigusa-san, not me.
MESSAGE.Translation: Saigusa-san was looking back at her.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝さんも、彼女を見ている。
MESSAGE.EN: Saigusa-san was looking back at her.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: For some reason, Saigusa-san nervously waved a few times.

MESSAGE.JP: 何故か気後れしたように二・三回手を振る三枝さん。
MESSAGE.EN: For some reason, Saigusa-san nervously waved a few times.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Yaha-.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「やはー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Yaha-.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She then retracted her hand awkwardly.

MESSAGE.JP: そのあと気恥ずかしそうに手を引っ込めた。
MESSAGE.EN: She then retracted her hand awkwardly.

MESSAGE.Translation: I thought I saw that expressionless girl smile faintly.

MESSAGE.JP: 無表情な女の子は、微かに笑った…気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought I saw that expressionless girl smile faintly.
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「行きましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: The prefects started walking again.

MESSAGE.JP: 再び歩き出す風紀委員たち。
MESSAGE.EN: The prefects started walking again.
MESSAGE.Translation: As the group disappeared around the corner, the usual noise returned to the corridor.

MESSAGE.JP: 廊下の角にその集団が消えると、廊下はざわめきを取り戻した。
MESSAGE.EN: As the group disappeared around the corner, the usual noise returned to the corridor.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝Phew.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「ふぅ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝Phew.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What's wrong, Saigusa-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうかした、三枝さん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What's wrong, Saigusa-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝It's nice when someone pays attention to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「自分のこと、見てくれるってやっぱりいいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝It's nice when someone pays attention to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Why are you saying that all of the sudden?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…いきなりどうかしたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Why are you saying that all of the sudden?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝No particular reason. It just crossed my mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「別に、なにも。なんとなく思っただけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝No particular reason. It just crossed my mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Saigusa@❝By the way Riki-kun, about that drama from earlier, actually...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `三枝@「ところで理樹くん、さっきのドラマなんだけどさ、実は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Saigusa@❝By the way Riki-kun, about that drama from earlier, actually...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I half-heartedly listened to Saigusa-san talk as we walked.

MESSAGE.JP: 三枝さんの話に適当な相槌を打ちながら歩いた。
MESSAGE.EN: I half-heartedly listened to Saigusa-san talk as we walked.
MESSAGE.Translation: In the end, I still hadn't found a roommate for Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: 結局クドのルームメイトは見つからず仕舞いだった。
MESSAGE.EN: In the end, I still hadn't found a roommate for Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll have to meet up with Kyousuke and everyone else soon.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕もそろそろ、恭介たちと合流しなければいけない。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll have to meet up with Kyousuke and everyone else soon.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝...I still want to try talking to more people.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「…やっぱりもう少しいろいろなひととお話してみます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝...I still want to try talking to more people.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And there's still one day left...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「時間はまだ…一日ありますし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And there's still one day left...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She was referring to the time limit set by the dorm head for turning in the application.

MESSAGE.JP: クドの言う時間とは、寮の募集メモの貼り付け期限のことだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: She was referring to the time limit set by the dorm head for turning in the application.
MESSAGE.Translation: She stood up from the bench and bowed before me.

MESSAGE.JP: クドはベンチから立ち上がると僕にぺこと頭を下げた。
MESSAGE.EN: She stood up from the bench and bowed before me.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Thanks for all your work today, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「今日はおつかれさまでした、直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Thanks for all your work today, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ye, yeah. You did well too, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「う、うん。お疲れ様、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ye, yeah. You did well too, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝See you tomorrow. Shee yuu～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「また明日です。しーゆー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝See you tomorrow. Shee yuu～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She raised her hand, and behind her was...

MESSAGE.JP: クドが手を挙げるその背後。
MESSAGE.EN: She raised her hand, and behind her was...
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Finally I've found you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「ようやく見つけたわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Finally I've found you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: A girl.

MESSAGE.JP: 女生徒が立っていた。
MESSAGE.EN: A girl.
MESSAGE.Translation: She was giving a somewhat expressionless and cold look.

MESSAGE.JP: どちらかといえば無表情でなんだか冷たい印象を受ける。
MESSAGE.EN: She was giving a somewhat expressionless and cold look.
MESSAGE.Translation: Huh, have I seen her somewhere before...?

MESSAGE.JP: あれ、どこかで見たような…？
MESSAGE.EN: Huh, have I seen her somewhere before...?
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Who is that person?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Who is that person?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She said looking at me.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕を見て言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She said looking at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought I remembered hearing that cold voice.

MESSAGE.JP: 冷えた声だ、と僕は思った。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought I remembered hearing that cold voice.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Um, um... Naoe-san, my friend. He helped me with things when I moved.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「え、えと、直枝さんはお友達です、部屋の、引っ越しのお手伝いをしてもらってて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Um, um... Naoe-san, my friend. He helped me with things when I moved.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝U, um... Do you happen to have some business with me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、あの、何のご用でしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝U, um... Do you happen to have some business with me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝I heard Noumi-san was looking for someone to live with.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「合部屋の相手を能美さんが探してると聞いたものだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝I heard Noumi-san was looking for someone to live with.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Noumi-san, right? I'm talking about you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「能美さんでしょ？　あなた」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Noumi-san, right? I'm talking about you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, yes. Kudryavka Noumi. P, pleased to meet you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、はい。能美クドリャフカです。は、はじめまして」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, yes. Kudryavka Noumi. P, pleased to meet you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She bowed.

MESSAGE.JP: クドはぺこんと頭を下げた。
MESSAGE.EN: She bowed.
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Nice to meet you. If you haven't found anyone yet... You haven't, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「はじめまして。もし相手がまだ見つかっていないのなら…見つかってないわよね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Nice to meet you. If you haven't found anyone yet... You haven't, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝No... I... haven't, but?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい…そう…です…けど？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝No... I... haven't, but?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝I see, good.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「そう、よかった」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝I see, good.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: This was all she said, and then she presented a bag she had been holding behind her.

MESSAGE.JP: 女の子はそれだけ言うと、後ろ手にしていた小さな旅行鞄を示した。
MESSAGE.EN: This was all she said, and then she presented a bag she had been holding behind her.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝U, um?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、あの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝U, um?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝My baggage, you can take it to the room for me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「私の荷物、今から部屋に置いてくるから」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝My baggage, you can take it to the room for me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Should you happen to have something you don't want me to see, I'd rather you cleaned it up beforehand.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「何か見られたくないものがあったら、先に片付けて欲しいんだけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Should you happen to have something you don't want me to see, I'd rather you cleaned it up beforehand.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...You should explain yourself, you have Kud completely lost.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…ちょっと、説明しないとクドが困ってるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...You should explain yourself, you have Kud completely lost.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I interrupted to rescue the bewildered Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は困惑しているクドの代わりに助け船を出した。
MESSAGE.EN: I interrupted to rescue the bewildered Kud.

MESSAGE.Translation: She glared at me.

MESSAGE.JP: 女の子はじっと僕を見つめた。
MESSAGE.EN: She glared at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Wh, what's wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「な、なにさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Wh, what's wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Being alone with a girl at this hour on campus, I can't say I approve of this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「こんな時間に、校内で女子とふたりいるのは感心しないわね」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Being alone with a girl at this hour on campus, I can't say I approve of this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝If you have an illicit sexual relationship, you should try hiding it better. But you've already been seen by me, so there's not much you can do about it now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「不純異性交遊なら、隠れてするべきよ。もっとも私に目撃されたら意味はないけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝If you have an illicit sexual relationship, you should try hiding it better. But you've already been seen by me, so there's not much you can do about it now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Il, illicit, what...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ふ、不純って…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Il, illicit, what...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝Oh well, that's okay. It's after school hours for me as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「まあ、いいわ。今は私も放課時間内だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝Oh well, that's okay. It's after school hours for me as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Just so we're clear, it's not really what you think...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「言っとくけど、別に、そういうんじゃないし…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Just so we're clear, it's not really what you think...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Besides, what were you trying to say earlier?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それに、さっきからなにが言いたいのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Besides, what were you trying to say earlier?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝You're a hindrance.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝You're a hindrance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝H-hindrance!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、邪魔!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝H-hindrance!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I began to feel awkward after her abrupt reply.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は即答された台詞に思わず鼻白む。
MESSAGE.EN: I began to feel awkward after her abrupt reply.
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝This girl's looking for a roommate. It's not something a boy should stick his nose into.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「その子はルームメイトを探している。ということは、男子に関係ない話でしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝This girl's looking for a roommate. It's not something a boy should stick his nose into.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She said glaring at me intently.

MESSAGE.JP: 女の子は僕を睨みながら言った。
MESSAGE.EN: She said glaring at me intently.

MESSAGE.Translation: She was making me angry.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はむっとした。
MESSAGE.EN: She was making me angry.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Maybe you're right, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうかもしれないけど、でも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Maybe you're right, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You should at least introduce yourself. Besides, I'm her friend.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「名乗るぐらいしたっていいだろ。僕はクドと知り合いだし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You should at least introduce yourself. Besides, I'm her friend.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So all the more so, if you're planning on living with her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もしきみがクドと合部屋を希望、なのだったら、なおさらだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So all the more so, if you're planning on living with her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She furrowed her brow at my words.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の言葉に女の子は微かに眉を動かした。
MESSAGE.EN: She furrowed her brow at my words.
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝It never fails to amaze me that there're still people who don't know who I am... Ah well, it can't be helped.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `？？？@「相変わらず知られてないというおかしな話になってるわけね。…しょうがないか」
MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝It never fails to amaze me that there're still people who don't know who I am... Ah well, it can't be helped.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `???@❝...Kanata Futaki.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `???@❝...Kanata Futaki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Futaki@❝I told you my name. Are we done?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `二木@「名乗ったわよ。これでいいでしょ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Futaki@❝I told you my name. Are we done?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked at Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕はクドを見た。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked at Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud was staring at her.

MESSAGE.JP: クドはきょとん、と彼女を見ている。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud was staring at her.
MESSAGE.Translation: The girl who called herself Futaki also turned her eyes on Kud without changing her expression.

MESSAGE.JP: 二木（ふたき）と名乗った女の子は、表情も変えず、クドのほうに視線を向けた。
MESSAGE.EN: The girl who called herself Futaki also turned her eyes on Kud without changing her expression.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クド？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She realized that I'd called her, and made a slightly troubled expression.

MESSAGE.JP: クドは僕の呼びかけに気がつくと、少し困ったような顔をした。
MESSAGE.EN: She realized that I'd called her, and made a slightly troubled expression.
MESSAGE.Translation: Still, she gave a small nod.

MESSAGE.JP: それでも、小さく頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Still, she gave a small nod.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was going to say something more, but――

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は何か言おうと口を開きかけたけど――
MESSAGE.EN: I was going to say something more, but――
MESSAGE.Translation: Kud shook her head slightly, and glanced at me with her usual smile.

MESSAGE.JP: クドは首を微かに振ると、いつものような彼女の笑顔を見せた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kud shook her head slightly, and glanced at me with her usual smile.
MESSAGE.Translation: Against that, I had no choice but to keep my mouth shut.

MESSAGE.JP: だから、黙らざるを得なかった。
MESSAGE.EN: Against that, I had no choice but to keep my mouth shut.
MESSAGE.Translation: ❛I'll be fine, I think.❜

MESSAGE.JP: 『たぶん、だいじょうぶです』
MESSAGE.EN: ❛I'll be fine, I think.❜
MESSAGE.Translation: Her smile seemed to contain such a meaning.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな意味合いがこもった笑顔。
MESSAGE.EN: Her smile seemed to contain such a meaning.
MESSAGE.Translation: If that's what she's decided herself, I have no right to say anything.

MESSAGE.JP: クドがそう判断したのなら、僕がどうこう言うことではないな、と思った。
MESSAGE.EN: If that's what she's decided herself, I have no right to say anything.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, Kud, I need to get going soon.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、クド、僕はそろそろ帰るよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, Kud, I need to get going soon.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Okay, Naoe-san, thanks for everything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい、直枝さん、ありがとうございました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Okay, Naoe-san, thanks for everything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...And Futaki-san too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…それから二木さんも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...And Futaki-san too.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝See you tomorrow, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「また明日ね、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝See you tomorrow, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, Naoe-san. See you tomorrow... Ah, shee yuu reita. Bye bye.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はい、直枝さん。また明日…あ、しーゆー・れいたー。ばいばいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, Naoe-san. See you tomorrow... Ah, shee yuu reita. Bye bye.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Bye bye, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ばいばい、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Bye bye, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I waved goodbye and turned my back to them.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は手を軽く振って、ふたりに背を向けた。
MESSAGE.EN: I waved goodbye and turned my back to them.
MESSAGE.Translation: I took a few steps and then glanced behind me.

MESSAGE.JP: 数歩だけ行って、振り返る。
MESSAGE.EN: I took a few steps and then glanced behind me.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I could only hope it'd turn out well.

MESSAGE.JP: …上手くやれればいいけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I could only hope it'd turn out well.
MESSAGE.Translation: I reluctantly walked away from there.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は後ろ髪引かれる思いで、その場を後にしたのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: I reluctantly walked away from there.
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked around the courtyard before heading off to practice.

MESSAGE.JP: 練習に行く前に、中庭を覗いてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked around the courtyard before heading off to practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just as I thought, there was Nishizono-san reading a book under a zelkova tree.

MESSAGE.JP: 思った通り、ケヤキの下で西園さんは本を広げていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Just as I thought, there was Nishizono-san reading a book under a zelkova tree.
MESSAGE.Translation: Is it safe here? I kept an eye out as I got closer and then called out to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 危険はないか？　辺りを見回しながら近づいていって、声をかける。
MESSAGE.EN: Is it safe here? I kept an eye out as I got closer and then called out to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: Maybe I shouldn't disturb her, I thought, but ended up calling out to her anyway.

MESSAGE.JP: 邪魔をしたら悪いかな、と思いながらも僕は声をかける。
MESSAGE.EN: Maybe I shouldn't disturb her, I thought, but ended up calling out to her anyway.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「西園さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Nishizono-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝.........❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝.........❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She only tore her glance away from her paperback book for a second, before resuming reading again.

MESSAGE.JP: 文庫本から、ちらりと顔を上げると、またすぐに目を戻してしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: She only tore her glance away from her paperback book for a second, before resuming reading again.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wonder what book she's reading.

MESSAGE.JP: 読んでいるのは、どんな本なんだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: I wonder what book she's reading.
MESSAGE.Translation: She seemed distracted because I was standing right next to her.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕がすぐ傍に立っているので、落ち着かない様子だ。
MESSAGE.EN: She seemed distracted because I was standing right next to her.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Um... If you stand there, it's hard to read.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「あの…そこに立たれると、本が読みにくいのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Um... If you stand there, it's hard to read.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, I see... I'm sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん…ごめん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, I see... I'm sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: As I thought, I was just getting in her way.

MESSAGE.JP: やっぱり、邪魔になるかな。
MESSAGE.EN: As I thought, I was just getting in her way.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I should go to practice.

MESSAGE.JP: 練習に行くことにしよう。
MESSAGE.EN: I should go to practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Please wait.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…待ってください」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Please wait.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She called out to me unexpectedly, just as I was about to leave.

MESSAGE.JP: すると、意外にも呼び止められる。
MESSAGE.EN: She called out to me unexpectedly, just as I was about to leave.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh, is something wrong?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え、なに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh, is something wrong?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...If you go now, it'll look like I cold-heartedly chased you away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…それでは、わたしが邪険に追い払ったようで気分が悪いです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...If you go now, it'll look like I cold-heartedly chased you away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I simply meant that you should step back a little.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「位置を変えてください、という意味だったのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I simply meant that you should step back a little.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、そうなんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I did think she was cold-heartedly chasing me away...

MESSAGE.JP: 邪険に追い払われたかと思った…。
MESSAGE.EN: I did think she was cold-heartedly chasing me away...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Then, may I sit next to you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、隣にいいかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Then, may I sit next to you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...Sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…どうぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...Sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Because of the season, there weren't any fallen leaves.

MESSAGE.JP: 季節がら、葉はほとんど落ちていない。
MESSAGE.EN: Because of the season, there weren't any fallen leaves.
MESSAGE.Translation: I lowered myself on the slightly chilly ground.

MESSAGE.JP: 少しひんやりする土の上に、腰を降ろす。
MESSAGE.EN: I lowered myself on the slightly chilly ground.
MESSAGE.Translation: She closed her book, running her slender fingers along the spine.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんは本を閉じると、背表紙をその細い指で撫でた。
MESSAGE.EN: She closed her book, running her slender fingers along the spine.
MESSAGE.Translation: With an affectionate gesture, she gently traced it with her hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 慈しむように、優しくなぞる。
MESSAGE.EN: With an affectionate gesture, she gently traced it with her hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: I could tell how much she cared about the book from that one subtle action.

MESSAGE.JP: その何気ない仕草からも、西園さんがその本を大切にしていることがわかった。
MESSAGE.EN: I could tell how much she cared about the book from that one subtle action.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What book are you reading?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何の本を読んでいたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What book are you reading?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no deep meaning to the question.

MESSAGE.JP: それは深い意味もない質問だった。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no deep meaning to the question.
MESSAGE.Translation: She held the book under her arm.

MESSAGE.JP: 西園さんが本を小脇に抱えている。
MESSAGE.EN: She held the book under her arm.
MESSAGE.Translation: The book's cover was all worn out in various places, and seemed like it'd been through a lot.

MESSAGE.JP: 本の表紙はところどころが破れていて、ずいぶんと年季が入っているように見える。
MESSAGE.EN: The book's cover was all worn out in various places, and seemed like it'd been through a lot.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was just a question to keep the conversation flowing.

MESSAGE.JP: 会話のきっかけ、それだけのことだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was just a question to keep the conversation flowing.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You were reading this book yesterday too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「昨日もその本を読んでいたよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You were reading this book yesterday too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Seems like it means a lot to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大切にしてるみたいだったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Seems like it means a lot to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Are you curious about it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「気になりますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Are you curious about it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...Something like that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なんとなくね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...Something like that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, do you like books?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さんは、本は読みますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san, do you like books?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't hate reading, but lately I've barely read anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「嫌いじゃないけど。最近はあんまりかな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't hate reading, but lately I've barely read anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I couldn't call myself a bookworm for sure.

MESSAGE.JP: 読書家というほどでもない。
MESSAGE.EN: I couldn't call myself a bookworm for sure.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I like reading.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしは本が好きです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I like reading.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Especially the one I'm holding... As you have noticed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「特に、いま持っている本は…直枝さんの言われるとおり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Especially the one I'm holding... As you have noticed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝This book is very important to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしの大切な本です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝This book is very important to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's my... My own self is written there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしの…わたし、そのものが書いてある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's my... My own self is written there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's how it appears to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そんな風にさえ、思える本なんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's how it appears to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san... Do you want to know it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん…あなたは、それを知りたいんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san... Do you want to know it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Do you want to get to know me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしを、知りたいと思うのですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Do you want to get to know me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: We sat in the shade of the tree.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕らは木陰にいる。
MESSAGE.EN: We sat in the shade of the tree.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was no wind, but it still felt like the temperature had dropped.

MESSAGE.JP: 風が吹いたわけでもないのに、気温が下がった気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: There was no wind, but it still felt like the temperature had dropped.
MESSAGE.Translation: The sunlight was obscured by the clouds, and I couldn't see what was being reflected deep inside her eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 日射しは雲に遮られ、西園さんの瞳の奥をうかがい知ることはできない。
MESSAGE.EN: The sunlight was obscured by the clouds, and I couldn't see what was being reflected deep inside her eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I'm not sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…わからない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I'm not sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I gave her an honest answer.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は正直に答えた。
MESSAGE.EN: I gave her an honest answer.
MESSAGE.Translation: That was all I could do.

MESSAGE.JP: そうするしか、なかった。
MESSAGE.EN: That was all I could do.
MESSAGE.Translation: I had no real reason to visit her.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が西園さんのところに来るのに、理由なんてない。
MESSAGE.EN: I had no real reason to visit her.
MESSAGE.Translation: That's right, I'd just felt like it.

MESSAGE.JP: そう、ただの気まぐれだ。
MESSAGE.EN: That's right, I'd just felt like it.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝As I said earlier, it's just something I felt like asking.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さっきも言ったけど、なんとなく訊いてみただけだから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝As I said earlier, it's just something I felt like asking.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Perhaps I should have chosen my words better.

MESSAGE.JP: もっと気の利いた台詞を返せば良いのかも知れない。
MESSAGE.EN: Perhaps I should have chosen my words better.
MESSAGE.Translation: But I couldn't do something that competent.

MESSAGE.JP: だけど、僕にはそんな器用なことはできなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: But I couldn't do something that competent.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…そうですか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly, I was looking directly into her eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 不意に、西園さんの瞳を正面に捉えた。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly, I was looking directly into her eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was drawn into her eyes of subdued amber.

MESSAGE.JP: 色素の薄い、その琥珀色の瞳を僕は覗き込む。
MESSAGE.EN: I was drawn into her eyes of subdued amber.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san. I'm sure that every beginning is always something very trivial.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さん。ものごとの始まりはきっと、何でもないことからだったりします」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Naoe-san. I'm sure that every beginning is always something very trivial.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That's why...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「ですから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That's why...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If you don't mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「もし、よろしければ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If you don't mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝One day, will you try asking me this question one more time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「いつか、もう一度その質問をしていただけますか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝One day, will you try asking me this question one more time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I thought about how amber was actually fossilized tree resin.

MESSAGE.JP: 琥珀って松ヤニの化石だったな、と脳裏に浮かぶ。
MESSAGE.EN: I thought about how amber was actually fossilized tree resin.
MESSAGE.Translation: A jewel trapped in time, and Nishizono-san's eyes, shining with that same color, looking at me.

MESSAGE.JP: 時間を止めてしまった宝石と、同じ色をした目を西園さんは僕に向ける。
MESSAGE.EN: A jewel trapped in time, and Nishizono-san's eyes, shining with that same color, looking at me.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you mean... It's okay if I come by again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それは…また来てもいいってことかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you mean... It's okay if I come by again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Even if I told you not to, you'd still come, wouldn't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「お断りします、と言っても来るんですよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Even if I told you not to, you'd still come, wouldn't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She smiled slightly.

MESSAGE.JP: 苦笑して頬を緩める。
MESSAGE.EN: She smiled slightly.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Do as you wish.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「お好きにどうぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Do as you wish.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If you don't wish to come back, Naoe-san, I won't mind that either.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「直枝さんが来たくなくなれば、それはそれで一向に構いませんから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If you don't wish to come back, Naoe-san, I won't mind that either.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Later, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃあ、また」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Later, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Yes, see you later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「はい、ではまた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Yes, see you later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: After making a promise that could hardly be considered one, I left the courtyard and headed to the sports grounds.

MESSAGE.JP: 約束とも言えない約束を交わして、僕は中庭を後にし、練習に向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: After making a promise that could hardly be considered one, I left the courtyard and headed to the sports grounds.
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh, I get to be together with everyone. What happiness. I felt like dancing in joy!

MESSAGE.JP: ああ、みんなと一緒に居られる時間がこんなにも嬉しい。踊り出したい気分だった。
MESSAGE.EN: Oh, I get to be together with everyone. What happiness. I felt like dancing in joy!
MESSAGE.Translation: After making a promise that could hardly be considered one, I left the courtyard and headed to the sports grounds.

MESSAGE.JP: 約束とも言えない約束を交わして、僕は中庭を後にし、練習に向かう。
MESSAGE.EN: After making a promise that could hardly be considered one, I left the courtyard and headed to the sports grounds.

MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone did their best during practice.

MESSAGE.JP: みんな頑張って練習した。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone did their best during practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝All right, catch it, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「よし、行くぜ理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝All right, catch it, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato, who for some reason was taking the practice quite seriously, was helping me with fielding practice.

MESSAGE.JP: なんだかんだでしっかり練習に参加してくれている真人にノック練習をしてもらう。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato, who for some reason was taking the practice quite seriously, was helping me with fielding practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: He'd probably accepted all of this as a part of his personal training.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人自身もこれはトレーニングの一環、ということで多少は納得してくれているみたいだった。
MESSAGE.EN: He'd probably accepted all of this as a part of his personal training.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Alright, I caught it!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よし、捕ったああぁっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Alright, I caught it!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: This is a lot of fun!

MESSAGE.JP: なんて楽しいんだ！
MESSAGE.EN: This is a lot of fun!
MESSAGE.Translation: I'd been having a very unpleasant day so exercise felt great! It was so refreshing!

MESSAGE.JP: 朝からあんな目に遭ったためか、運動するのが気持ちいい！　爽快だ！
MESSAGE.EN: I'd been having a very unpleasant day so exercise felt great! It was so refreshing!
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝All right, there!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「よし、捕ったっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝All right, there!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...As someone who'd never played baseball before, I was gradually getting better.

MESSAGE.JP: …あんまり野球の経験もなかったが、僕自身もだんだん上手くなってきた気がする。
MESSAGE.EN: ...As someone who'd never played baseball before, I was gradually getting better.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yeah, that's it. Can I throw a faster one this time?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おう、いい感じだぜ。もうちょい速えのでもだいじょうぶか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yeah, that's it. Can I throw a faster one this time?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, leave it to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おっけー、任せといてよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, leave it to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I answered him, as I clapped on the glove.

MESSAGE.JP: グローブをばし、と叩きながら答える。
MESSAGE.EN: I answered him, as I clapped on the glove.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Mm, we're out of balls.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ん、ボールがねぇな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Mm, we're out of balls.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Ah, here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「ああ、はい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Ah, here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「お、すまねぇな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝All right, let's do it, Riki.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「よっしゃ、行くぞ理樹」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝All right, let's do it, Riki.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What, isn't this a cup of seaweed!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ってこれはワンカップもずくじゃねえかぁーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What, isn't this a cup of seaweed!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What's going on!? Did the ball transform into seaweed!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんだこれはっ!?　ボールがもずくに変化したとでもいうのか…!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What's going on!? Did the ball transform into seaweed!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You never fail to make me laugh with the nonsense you spout.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「何を想像するだけで愉快なステキワードをシャウトしてるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You never fail to make me laugh with the nonsense you spout.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh, Kurugaya-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あれ、来ヶ谷さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh, Kurugaya-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Hearing me call her name, Kurugaya-san turned in my direction and raised a hand in greeting.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕の言葉に来ヶ谷さんはこっちを向き、手をにぎにぎさせて挨拶をする。
MESSAGE.EN: Hearing me call her name, Kurugaya-san turned in my direction and raised a hand in greeting.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hey there, you're really going at it, young men.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「やあ、やっとるね少年達」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hey there, you're really going at it, young men.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What is it all of a sudden?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「突然どうしたのさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What is it all of a sudden?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'm just here on a whim.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なに、ちょっとした気紛れというやつだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'm just here on a whim.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I saw you taking Miss Kamikita along with you to the sports field and wondered what you were up to.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「キミが神北女史を連れてグラウンドへ向かってるのを見て、何をやっているのかと思ってな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I saw you taking Miss Kamikita along with you to the sports field and wondered what you were up to.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Is she interested...?

MESSAGE.JP: 興味を持ってくれてるのか…。
MESSAGE.EN: Is she interested...?
MESSAGE.Translation: To think that even a student that's as aloof as Kurugaya-san would willing get herself involved in this...

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんのような孤立している生徒まで巻き込めるなんて…。
MESSAGE.EN: To think that even a student that's as aloof as Kurugaya-san would willing get herself involved in this...
MESSAGE.Translation: Isn't baseball great? This is fantastic.

MESSAGE.JP: いいじゃないか、野球。素晴らしい。
MESSAGE.EN: Isn't baseball great? This is fantastic.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I can't put up with it; that you're the only ones doing something fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「おまえらだけで、何か楽しそうなことをやっているのが気に食わん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I can't put up with it; that you're the only ones doing something fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I want to let flow the sweat of youth together with these lively young girls too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「私にもぴちぴちの少女達と一緒に、しっぽりと青春の汗をかかせろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I want to let flow the sweat of youth together with these lively young girls too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, I think you can join.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、かいていったらいいと思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, I think you can join.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: It was reassuring having Kurugaya-san nearby.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんが近くにいてくれるのは心強い。
MESSAGE.EN: It was reassuring having Kurugaya-san nearby.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I don't mind, but it's up to Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オレぁ構いはしねえが、後は恭介次第ってとこだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I don't mind, but it's up to Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. I'll go ask him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだよね。訊いてみよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. I'll go ask him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's just how things turned out... or should I say, it was something inevitable...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやそれは成り行きというか、他になかったというか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's just how things turned out... or should I say, it was something inevitable...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Very well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「よし」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Very well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Count me in.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「私も混ぜろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Count me in.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? Wait, no...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　いや、だめ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? Wait, no...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'll mince you into pieces, foolish brat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ブチ殺すぞヘタレ小僧」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'll mince you into pieces, foolish brat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why do I have to get killed right away!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「何で問答無用に殺されなきゃいけないのさっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why do I have to get killed right away!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I can't put up with it; that you're the only ones doing something fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「おまえらだけで、何か楽しそうなことをやっているのが気に食わん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I can't put up with it; that you're the only ones doing something fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I want to let flow the sweat of youth together with these lively young girls too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「私にもぴちぴちの少女達と一緒に、しっぽりと青春の汗をかかせろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I want to let flow the sweat of youth together with these lively young girls too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's a problem if you're saying it in such a suspicious manner...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いやそんな怪しい表現されても困るけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's a problem if you're saying it in such a suspicious manner...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Everyone's pretty serious about this, you know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…結構みんな本気でやってるんだよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Everyone's pretty serious about this, you know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝All right, all the better then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ふむ、なおよろしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝All right, all the better then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'll be very helpful to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「私は戦力になるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'll be very helpful to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, you do look like you would, but...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ確かにそんな気はするけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, you do look like you would, but...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Well, I think she's extraordinarily good at sports, but...

MESSAGE.JP: …いや、確かに来ヶ谷さんは運動とかすごかった気がするけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Well, I think she's extraordinarily good at sports, but...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I don't get it all, but if she wants to join, why not let her in?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オレぁよくわかんねえけどよ、別にやりたいってんならいいんじゃねえか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I don't get it all, but if she wants to join, why not let her in?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、だってさ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...At this rate we'll have an all-girls team...

MESSAGE.JP: …このままだと女の子ばっかのチームになっちゃうような気が…。
MESSAGE.EN: ...At this rate we'll have an all-girls team...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yep, you sure are understanding, young man Masato. I don't dislike guys like you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、物解りがいいな真人少年。そういう男は割と好きだよ、おねーさんは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yep, you sure are understanding, young man Masato. I don't dislike guys like you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝All right, I'll let you have some seaweed.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「よし、もずくをあげよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝All right, I'll let you have some seaweed.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ありがとよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...He's actually eating it.

MESSAGE.JP: …普通に食べている。
MESSAGE.EN: ...He's actually eating it.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's get Kyousuke's opinion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、恭介に訊いてみようか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's get Kyousuke's opinion.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hm, everyone is always gathering around you, but you're going to ask the Natsume brother for permission?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ふむ、皆キミを中心に集まっているのに、棗兄に了承を取るのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hm, everyone is always gathering around you, but you're going to ask the Natsume brother for permission?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh? No matter how you look at it, Kyousuke is the one everyone gathers around.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　いや、どう考えても恭介中心でしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh? No matter how you look at it, Kyousuke is the one everyone gathers around.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, If you say so.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、そこはいいだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, If you say so.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Let's go ask him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「んじゃ訊きにいってみよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Let's go ask him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Aight, she'll have to go through a tryout.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よし、入団テストだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Aight, she'll have to go through a tryout.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That again...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「またやるの…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That again...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Is that really necessary?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「そんなものが必要か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Is that really necessary?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Considering what we all saw earlier, your physical skills shouldn't be a problem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ、前の一件を見てる限り、身体能力に問題はないだろうがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Considering what we all saw earlier, your physical skills shouldn't be a problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝So, here we go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃあ、行くぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝So, here we go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What's the main ingredient in tofu?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「豆腐の原料は？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What's the main ingredient in tofu?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Soybeans.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「大豆」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Soybeans.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝You pass.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「合格」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝You pass.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eeh?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「えぇー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eeh?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...The tryout is over.

MESSAGE.JP: …テスト、終了。
MESSAGE.EN: ...The tryout is over.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝He doesn't care who it is anymore.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「もうこいつ、なんでもいいんだろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝He doesn't care who it is anymore.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: With that, Kurugaya-san joined our team.

MESSAGE.JP: というわけで、来ヶ谷さんもメンバーに加入することになった。
MESSAGE.EN: With that, Kurugaya-san joined our team.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The number of people in the battle ranking has increased as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「バトルのほうも、人数が増えて賑やかになってきたな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The number of people in the battle ranking has increased as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, let's move Riki from first place to the bottom of the list.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よし、ここらで１位の理樹を最下位にしてみよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, let's move Riki from first place to the bottom of the list.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, let's move Riki from second place to the bottom of the list.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よし、ここらで２位の理樹を最下位にしてみよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, let's move Riki from second place to the bottom of the list.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, let's move Riki from third place to the bottom of the list.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よし、ここらで３位の理樹を最下位にしてみよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, let's move Riki from third place to the bottom of the list.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh, hey what's that about!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ええーっ、ちょっと待ってよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh, hey what's that about!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The reason, of course, is to heat things up.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理由はもちろん、燃えるからだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The reason, of course, is to heat things up.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝How's this heating things up, it's so unfair I'm just feeling colder!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「燃えるどころか理不尽すぎて逆に冷めるよ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝How's this heating things up, it's so unfair I'm just feeling colder!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hah, finally Riki's been unleashed...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「はっ、ついに理樹を解き放つか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hah, finally Riki's been unleashed...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's not like I was being held down by anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そんな何も秘められてないからっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's not like I was being held down by anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh my... And I'd finally reached first place, only to be forced down to the bottom all of a sudden...

MESSAGE.JP: ああ…せっかく１位まで登り詰めたのに、唐突に最下位なんて…。
MESSAGE.EN: Oh my... And I'd finally reached first place, only to be forced down to the bottom all of a sudden...
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh my... And I'd finally reached second place, only to be forced down to the bottom all of a sudden...

MESSAGE.JP: ああ…せっかく２位だったのに、唐突に最下位なんて…。
MESSAGE.EN: Oh my... And I'd finally reached second place, only to be forced down to the bottom all of a sudden...
MESSAGE.Translation: Oh my... And I'd finally reached third place, only to be forced down to the bottom all of a sudden...

MESSAGE.JP: ああ…せっかく３位だったのに、唐突に最下位なんて…。
