MESSAGE.EN: Oh my... And I'd finally reached third place, only to be forced down to the bottom all of a sudden...
MESSAGE.Translation: It was useless objecting to something Kyousuke had decided upon.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介の思いつきにはいつだって逆らえないんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: It was useless objecting to something Kyousuke had decided upon.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Seems like I already know everyone here. Well, I hope we all get along.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「見事に見知った顔ばかりだな。まあ、よろしく頼む」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Seems like I already know everyone here. Well, I hope we all get along.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, I have big hopes for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ああ、期待してるぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, I have big hopes for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, living up to your expectations is something I can manage.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、恭介氏の期待に応える程度のことはやってのけよう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, living up to your expectations is something I can manage.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I see. Are my expectations just right for you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そうか。俺の期待は相当だぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I see. Are my expectations just right for you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Then I'll just have to do what's expected of me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ならば相当の仕事をするまでさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Then I'll just have to do what's expected of me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I can't wait.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そいつは楽しみだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I can't wait.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: They traded grins.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりでにやり、と笑い合う。
MESSAGE.EN: They traded grins.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...They seem to be getting along in a strange way.

MESSAGE.JP: …妙にウマが合うようだ、このふたりは。
MESSAGE.EN: ...They seem to be getting along in a strange way.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Let's get along and do our best together～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「よろしくねー、いっしょにがんばろー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Let's get along and do our best together～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yep, I'm very happy you seem to be doing so well, Komari-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、小毬君は元気でとてもよろしい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yep, I'm very happy you seem to be doing so well, Komari-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Onee-san will pat you now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「おねーさんがなでなでしてやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Onee-san will pat you now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She patted her head.

MESSAGE.JP: …頭をなでる。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She patted her head.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Auu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ああう…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Auu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Seems like she isn't resisting.

MESSAGE.JP: …なんか逆らえないみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Seems like she isn't resisting.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝So, Miss Kamikita. Are these all the members you've got?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「時に神北女史。メンバーはこれだけなのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝So, Miss Kamikita. Are these all the members you've got?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Um... Me, Riki-kun, Rin-chan, Kyousuke-san, Masato-kun... and Yui-chan. Six people total.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「えーと、私、理樹君、りんちゃん恭介さん真人君と…あと、ゆいちゃん。６人かな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Um... Me, Riki-kun, Rin-chan, Kyousuke-san, Masato-kun... and Yui-chan. Six people total.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What, doesn't that mean you don't even have enough members yet...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なんだ、まだ野球できるだけのメンバーすら集まってないじゃないか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What, doesn't that mean you don't even have enough members yet...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝And, where's this Yui-chan?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「して、ゆいちゃんとはどこに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝And, where's this Yui-chan?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue? Right here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえ？　ここに」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue? Right here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She pointed at Kurugaya-san.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんを指差す。
MESSAGE.EN: She pointed at Kurugaya-san.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Mm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ん？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Mm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked behind her.

MESSAGE.JP: 後ろを向く。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked behind her.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝There's nobody there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「誰もいないぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝There's nobody there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Therefore, Yui-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「だから、ゆいちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Therefore, Yui-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Mmm?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「むむ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Mmm?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Because you're Yuiko Kurugaya.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「くるがやゆいこだからー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Because you're Yuiko Kurugaya.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yui-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ゆいちゃんなのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yui-chan.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What!? You mean I'm Yui-chan!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なにい!?　ゆいちゃんって私かっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What!? You mean I'm Yui-chan!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, there's nobody else here whose name begins with Yui...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、ここに他にゆいって付く人いないよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, there's nobody else here whose name begins with Yui...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝No... I've never been called that name before...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「いや…ずっと名前など呼ばれたことはなかったからな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝No... I've never been called that name before...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I can't give a normal reaction to that. Call me Kurugaya-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「普通に反応できん。来ヶ谷ちゃんと呼んでくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I can't give a normal reaction to that. Call me Kurugaya-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Somehow I couldn't really bring myself to agree with her suggestion either.

MESSAGE.JP: かなりどうかと思う呼び名を提案する。
MESSAGE.EN: Somehow I couldn't really bring myself to agree with her suggestion either.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue? That's no good. Yui-chan is Yui-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえ？　だめだよ。ゆいちゃんは、ゆいちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue? That's no good. Yui-chan is Yui-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝No, like I've been saying...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「いや、だから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝No, like I've been saying...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...That's how it turned into a battle.

MESSAGE.JP: …なんかバトルが勃発していた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...That's how it turned into a battle.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝So that's why, from now on Yui-chan is everyone's friend～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「というわけで、今日からゆいちゃんもお友達～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝So that's why, from now on Yui-chan is everyone's friend～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Aah, I don't even care anymore...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ああ、もうどうだって良くなってきた…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Aah, I don't even care anymore...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Onee-san received a devastating blow...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「おねーさん最早大打撃だよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Onee-san received a devastating blow...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Just what kind of battle was that...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いったい何の勝負だったんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Just what kind of battle was that...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Then, next it's Rin-chan's turn～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃあ、次はりんちゃんの番～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Then, next it's Rin-chan's turn～!❞

MESSAGE.Translation: Rejecting her words, she once again hid behind my back.

MESSAGE.JP: 話を振られると、また僕の後ろに隠れる。
MESSAGE.EN: Rejecting her words, she once again hid behind my back.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hey, Rin, you should go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ほら鈴、行きなよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hey, Rin, you should go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You'll be on the same team from now on.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「これから、一緒のチームでやってくんだからさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You'll be on the same team from now on.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Yui-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ゆいちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Yui-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Gumu...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ぐむ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Gumu...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'm sorry, but I just can't endure being called that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「すまんが、そう呼び続けられるのはとても耐えられん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'm sorry, but I just can't endure being called that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Then... Kurugaya.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なら…くるがや」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Then... Kurugaya.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yep, that's better.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、落ち着いた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yep, that's better.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You can call me Kurugaya-chan if you wish.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「来ヶ谷ちゃんとなら呼んでもらっていい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You can call me Kurugaya-chan if you wish.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝That sounds silly...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「そっちの方がセンスないぞ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝That sounds silly...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Then, call me Komari-chan too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃあ、私もこまりちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Then, call me Komari-chan too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Komari-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こまりちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Komari-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep, a-okay～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、おっけーですよ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep, a-okay～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She didn't seem to be having problems this time.

MESSAGE.JP: 今回も大丈夫だったようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She didn't seem to be having problems this time.

MESSAGE.Translation: Was I just worrying unnecessarily?

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が心配しすぎなだけだろうか？
MESSAGE.EN: Was I just worrying unnecessarily?

MESSAGE.Translation: ...She continued standing behind me.

MESSAGE.JP: …僕の影から出ようとしない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She continued standing behind me.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝She seems like quite the shy one, that Natsume girl.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ずいぶん人見知りの激しい子だったんだな、棗妹は」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝She seems like quite the shy one, that Natsume girl.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Rin-chan, call me by my first name too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「りんちゃんも名前で呼ぼー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Rin-chan, call me by my first name too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝All right, I'll go first.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「はい、まず私っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝All right, I'll go first.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'm Komari Kamikita.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「私は神北小毬です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'm Komari Kamikita.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Komari Kamikita.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「かみきた、こまり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Komari Kamikita.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Therefore, Komari-chan.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「だから、小毬ちゃん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Therefore, Komari-chan.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Ko, Koma...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Ko, Koma...❞

MESSAGE.Translation: She turned around and darted away.

MESSAGE.JP: 背を向けてたたたたたっ、と走り去る。
MESSAGE.EN: She turned around and darted away.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...But.

MESSAGE.EN: ...But.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Yup, I got her.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、捕まえた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Yup, I got her.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Kurugaya-san, who'd already seen it coming, had a tight grip on her.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんが先回りをして、がっしと捕まえる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kurugaya-san, who'd already seen it coming, had a tight grip on her.

MESSAGE.Translation: She started to struggle.

MESSAGE.JP: じたばたと暴れる。
MESSAGE.EN: She started to struggle.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Look, you should try saying it at least once.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ほら、まずは一回だけでいいから言ってみるといい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Look, you should try saying it at least once.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Like when you're riding a bike, you need to make your legs work a bit to pass a person in front of you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「自転車で前の人を追い越すとき、足にほんの少し力をこめるだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Like when you're riding a bike, you need to make your legs work a bit to pass a person in front of you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...You just need to put in that much effort.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…その程度の頑張りでいいんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...You just need to put in that much effort.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She was trying to persuade her.

MESSAGE.JP: 諭すように言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She was trying to persuade her.

MESSAGE.Translation: ...This is turning out to be a more difficult task than I'd imagined it would be.

MESSAGE.JP: …思った以上に難航しそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...This is turning out to be a more difficult task than I'd imagined it would be.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝That's why I brought this along～!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「というわけで持ってきましたー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝That's why I brought this along～!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She opened a sketch book,

MESSAGE.JP: 小毬さんがばさ、とスケッチブックを開く。
MESSAGE.EN: She opened a sketch book,
MESSAGE.Translation: and wrote ❛Komari-chan❜ on a blank page with a crayon.

MESSAGE.JP: そして真っ白なページに、クレヨンで『こまりちゃん』と書いた。
MESSAGE.EN: and wrote ❛Komari-chan❜ on a blank page with a crayon.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Here, read this～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「はい、よんでみて～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Here, read this～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Ko, Koma...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こ、こま…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Ko, Koma...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yep.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yep.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Ko...❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Ko...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝$K48Komada$K0.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝$K48Komada$K0.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fueeeee!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえええっ!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fueeeee!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Who is Komada by the way...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ていうか、駒田って誰だよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Who is Komada by the way...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Isn't he a former batter for the Giants.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「元巨人の打者か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Isn't he a former batter for the Giants.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ueen, I'm not a former batter for the Giants.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うえーん、私元巨人じゃないー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ueen, I'm not a former batter for the Giants.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...This seems to be even more difficult than I'd thought.

MESSAGE.JP: …思った数倍は難航しそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: ...This seems to be even more difficult than I'd thought.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Therefore, I request your cooperation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「というわけで協力を仰ぎたい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Therefore, I request your cooperation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No problem.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まあ、別に構わんが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No problem.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: This time the plan was for all of us to keep calling Komari-san by her name to set the mood right for Rin to say it.

MESSAGE.JP: 今度はみんなで小毬さんの名前を呼び、そのノリで鈴に名前を呼ばせる作戦らしい。
MESSAGE.EN: This time the plan was for all of us to keep calling Komari-san by her name to set the mood right for Rin to say it.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Why do I have to go along with your stupid ideas...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なんでオレまで、んなアホなことに付き合わされんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Why do I have to go along with your stupid ideas...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Don't say stupid! I'm dedicating my utmost effort here!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「アホ言うな、こっちは必死なんだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Don't say stupid! I'm dedicating my utmost effort here!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝If you're so serious about it, just say her name already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「必死なら、ノリなんて利用せずに呼べよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝If you're so serious about it, just say her name already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Idiot, if I could I wouldn't be relying on you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ばか、無理だから、ノリにすがってるんだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Idiot, if I could I wouldn't be relying on you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I just don't get you...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「わけがわからねぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I just don't get you...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Well, fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…まあ、いいけどよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Well, fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She's really trying, huh?

MESSAGE.JP: …鈴も必死になってくれてるのか。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She's really trying, huh?
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Hmm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…ふうん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Hmm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke and I looked at each other and nodded happily.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介は僕と顔を見合わせ、嬉しそうに頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke and I looked at each other and nodded happily.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Let me do it first. Komari-kun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「じゃあ私からだ。小毬君」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Let me do it first. Komari-kun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Komari-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「小毬さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Komari-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝...Komari.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「…小毬」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝...Komari.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Komari.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「小毬」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Komari.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yes!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「はいっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yes!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san held up the sketch book on which the word ❛Komari-chan❜ was written.
