MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san held up the sketch book on which the word ❛Komari-chan❜ was written.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Komada.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「駒田」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Komada.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Uaaaaaaan～!! I am not Komadaaaaaaa～!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うああああーーんっ!!　私駒田じゃないーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Uaaaaaaan～!! I am not Komadaaaaaaa～!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...She tossed the book aside and ran away.

MESSAGE.JP: …小毬さん、スケッチブックを投げ出して逃走。
MESSAGE.EN: ...She tossed the book aside and ran away.

MESSAGE.Translation: ...I could tell that she was cursing herself at that moment, just by looking at her expression.

MESSAGE.JP: …鈴の表情から自己嫌悪が見て取れた。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I could tell that she was cursing herself at that moment, just by looking at her expression.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Hmm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…ふむ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Hmm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: *Grab*.

MESSAGE.JP: がばぁっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Grab*.

MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly Kurugaya-san hugged Rin.

MESSAGE.JP: 唐突に来ヶ谷さんが鈴を抱きしめる。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly Kurugaya-san hugged Rin.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Oh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「おっと」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Oh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She released her.

MESSAGE.JP: ぱ、と来ヶ谷さんが腕を放した。
MESSAGE.EN: She released her.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What the hell are you doing, jerk!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「な、なにするんじゃーっ、ぼけーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What the hell are you doing, jerk!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Good, now use my name instead of ❛jerk.❜❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、そのぼけーの代わりに私の名前を」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Good, now use my name instead of ❛jerk.❜❞

MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...Kurukuruje-.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…くるくるぱー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...Kurukuruje-.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You don't need the ❛je-❜ part.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ぱーはないほうがいいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You don't need the ❛je-❜ part.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Kurukuru.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「くるくる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Kurukuru.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, not bad for your first try.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、始めはそれでいいだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, not bad for your first try.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝And, who's that girl who fell down over there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「で、あそこで逃げる途中ですっ転んでるのは？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝And, who's that girl who fell down over there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: We glanced over to where Kurugaya-san had pointed and found that Komari-san had executed a splendid slide, head first.

MESSAGE.JP: 来ヶ谷さんが指差す先には、見事なヘッドスライディングをかます小毬さんの姿が。
MESSAGE.EN: We glanced over to where Kurugaya-san had pointed and found that Komari-san had executed a splendid slide, head first.
MESSAGE.Translation: ...No, I guess she just tumbled over.

MESSAGE.JP: …いや、転んだだけなんだろうけど。
MESSAGE.EN: ...No, I guess she just tumbled over.

MESSAGE.Translation: Rin began to dash away.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が駆け出す。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin began to dash away.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Ueeen, it hurts～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うえーん、いたい～…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Ueeen, it hurts～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Are you all right, Komari-chan?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「だいじょうぶか、こまりちゃんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Are you all right, Komari-chan?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...You see?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…な？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...You see?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝She's moved one step forward.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「一歩前進、だな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝She's moved one step forward.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yup.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yup.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...I've got the feeling that this will be a really good team.

MESSAGE.JP: …このチーム、ホントにいいチームになるかもしれない。
MESSAGE.EN: ...I've got the feeling that this will be a really good team.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝All right, we're all here so let's get started.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「んじゃ、揃ったことだしおっぱじめっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝All right, we're all here so let's get started.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.Translation: Everyone did their best during practice.

MESSAGE.JP: みんな頑張って練習した。
MESSAGE.EN: Everyone did their best during practice.
MESSAGE.Translation: After the club activity we returned the baseball equipment where it belonged.

MESSAGE.JP: 練習が終わり、いつものように道具を部室に戻す。
MESSAGE.EN: After the club activity we returned the baseball equipment where it belonged.
MESSAGE.Translation: There's still some time left before dinner...

MESSAGE.JP: さて、夕飯までまだ時間はあるけど…。
MESSAGE.EN: There's still some time left before dinner...
MESSAGE.Translation: Alright, I'll wander around.

MESSAGE.JP: よし、さすらうぞ。
MESSAGE.EN: Alright, I'll wander around.
MESSAGE.Translation: Come on out. I want strong enemies.

MESSAGE.JP: 出てこい。強敵め。
MESSAGE.EN: Come on out. I want strong enemies.
MESSAGE.Translation: Where are you, where are you, where are you?

MESSAGE.JP: どこだ、どこだ、どこだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Where are you, where are you, where are you?
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝What are you doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「何してるのよ、あなた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝What are you doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Huh? Right now? I'm wandering around...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　今？　さすらってるところだけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Huh? Right now? I'm wandering around...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝What are you thinking?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「何考えてるの、あなた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝What are you thinking?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝If you walk around aimlessly by yourself, you're going to get captured again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「そんなひとりで闇雲に歩いて回っていたら、また捕まっちゃうわよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝If you walk around aimlessly by yourself, you're going to get captured again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Shoot, you're right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわ、その通りだっ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Shoot, you're right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I was careless. She spared me from getting tortured again...

MESSAGE.JP: うかつだった。また拷問なんて勘弁だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: I was careless. She spared me from getting tortured again...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Idiot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「馬鹿ね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Idiot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Sorry... I'll be more prudent from now on...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ごめん…これからは自重するよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Sorry... I'll be more prudent from now on...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll abstain from participating in battles for a while...

MESSAGE.JP: しばらく、バトルには参加せずにおこう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll abstain from participating in battles for a while...
MESSAGE.Translation: I parted with Tokido-san and headed back to the dorms.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸さんと別れて、寮への帰り道。
MESSAGE.EN: I parted with Tokido-san and headed back to the dorms.
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I should go back to my room and get some rest...

MESSAGE.JP: 部屋に戻って休んでおこう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I should go back to my room and get some rest...
MESSAGE.Translation: On the way back to the boys' dorm we ran into somebody.

MESSAGE.JP: その帰りの道。
MESSAGE.EN: On the way back to the boys' dorm we ran into somebody.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You guys!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「おまえたちっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You guys!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: It was Kengo.

MESSAGE.JP: そこへ現れたのは謙吾だった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was Kengo.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Oh, now you're interested in playing baseball?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「お、野球やる気になったのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Oh, now you're interested in playing baseball?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Stupid, this is no time for that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「馬鹿、遊んでいる場合か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Stupid, this is no time for that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: His words made Rin realize something.

MESSAGE.JP: その言葉を聞いて、鈴がぴんと耳を立てる。
MESSAGE.EN: His words made Rin realize something.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, we have to prepare dinner!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹、夕飯の支度だ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, we have to prepare dinner!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ、そうだったね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝We have more people now than at lunchtime so it'll be less trouble.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「これだけの人数がいるんだ。昼ほど手間取らずに済みそうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝We have more people now than at lunchtime so it'll be less trouble.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: The look Komari-san was giving us clearly told that she had no idea what we were talking about.

MESSAGE.JP: なんのことかわかっていない小毬さんたちが『？』の表情を浮かべている。
MESSAGE.EN: The look Komari-san was giving us clearly told that she had no idea what we were talking about.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Everybody come help!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「みんな、手伝え！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Everybody come help!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin headed for the cafeteria at top speed.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴が一目散に駆け出していった。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin headed for the cafeteria at top speed.
MESSAGE.Translation: Although it seemed very unusual for her to be ordering us around like this, she did it without hesitation. She must have a strong sense of duty.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴がこのメンツ全員に命令するなんて、すごくありえないことのはずなのに…。それだけ義務感を覚えているのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Although it seemed very unusual for her to be ordering us around like this, she did it without hesitation. She must have a strong sense of duty.
MESSAGE.Translation: We followed her like she told us to.

MESSAGE.JP: 言われるがままその後に僕たちも続いた。
MESSAGE.EN: We followed her like she told us to.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What... This group will do anything, won't it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なんだ…色々やる集団なんだな、これは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What... This group will do anything, won't it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...Seems like she came up with a response right away.

MESSAGE.JP: …すぐに対応してくれたみたいだ。
MESSAGE.EN: ...Seems like she came up with a response right away.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Now then, we're already in a dire situation...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「さて、すでに切羽詰った状況だが…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Now then, we're already in a dire situation...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: There's only one hour and ten minutes left before it's dinner time.

MESSAGE.JP: 夕食の時間までは、一時間強。
MESSAGE.EN: There's only one hour and ten minutes left before it's dinner time.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝What're we supposed to do...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「どうすりゃいいんだよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝What're we supposed to do...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝First of all, we need to decide the menu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まずはメニューを決めなければならない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝First of all, we need to decide the menu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝How about pork cutlet?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「カツか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝How about pork cutlet?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Unfortunately there isn't any pork here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「残念だけど、カツに出来る豚肉はなさそうだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Unfortunately there isn't any pork here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue? Are we going to prepare dinner?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえ？　夕食の準備なの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue? Are we going to prepare dinner?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah. We're doing it instead of the normal staff.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おばちゃんたちの代わりをやってるんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah. We're doing it instead of the normal staff.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Okay, I've got it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「そっかー、わかったよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Okay, I've got it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Wouldn't you just have to look at this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ならばこれを見ればいいんじゃないか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Wouldn't you just have to look at this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She asked while browsing the file on the door of the large refrigerator.

MESSAGE.JP: 大型の冷蔵庫に掛かっていたファイルをめくりながら言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She asked while browsing the file on the door of the large refrigerator.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It says today is curry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「今日はカレーのようだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It says today is curry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's decided, then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃ、決まりだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's decided, then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝We're gonna do it all by ourselves, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「今度はガチで作るのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝We're gonna do it all by ourselves, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's just like on a camp. This'll be fun.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「なんだかキャンプみたいで楽しいねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's just like on a camp. This'll be fun.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Although we were under a lot of pressure, she was still carefree.

MESSAGE.JP: この切羽詰った状況でも、小毬さんは能天気だ。
MESSAGE.EN: Although we were under a lot of pressure, she was still carefree.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What should we do about ingredients? It's obvious there isn't enough in the fridge.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「素材はどうする。ここの冷蔵庫にあるものでは明らかに足りないだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What should we do about ingredients? It's obvious there isn't enough in the fridge.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: It reminded me that the ready-made curry had become our emergency resort for the lunch already.

MESSAGE.JP: そうだ、それが見つからないから昼はレトルトになったんだった。
MESSAGE.EN: It reminded me that the ready-made curry had become our emergency resort for the lunch already.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝What should we do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「どうしたものか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝What should we do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Everybody tried to come up with a good idea.

MESSAGE.JP: うーん、とみんなで考え込んでいると。
MESSAGE.EN: Everybody tried to come up with a good idea.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝...Oh.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `おばさん@「…あら」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff Lady@❝...Oh.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: A savior appeared.

MESSAGE.JP: 救世主が現れた。
MESSAGE.EN: A savior appeared.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝You guys have been working here, haven't you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `おばさん@「あなたたちが回してくれてたのね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff Lady@❝You guys have been working here, haven't you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She's one of the regular cafeteria staff.

MESSAGE.JP: いつもの学食のおばちゃんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: She's one of the regular cafeteria staff.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Wow... She sure is a savior...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おお…まさしく救世主だぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Wow... She sure is a savior...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Have you gotten better?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「体調はだいじょうぶなんですか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Have you gotten better?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝I've recovered a little bit, so I came to see the situation.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `おばさん@「少し良くなったから、どうしてるか見に来たのよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff Lady@❝I've recovered a little bit, so I came to see the situation.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝I never thought you students would be here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `おばさん@「まさか生徒のあなたたちがいるとは思わなかったけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff Lady@❝I never thought you students would be here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Even as she smiled, she still looked ill.

MESSAGE.JP: …笑ってみせるが、あまり調子は良くなさそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: Even as she smiled, she still looked ill.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝...You'd better get some more rest.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「…休んでたほうがいいぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝...You'd better get some more rest.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Okay, could you tell us what to do?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、じゃあおばちゃんは何すればいいか、私たちに教えてくださいなー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Okay, could you tell us what to do?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝We'll take care of it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「そしたら私たちで何とかできるよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝We'll take care of it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝Really? ...Thanks a lot.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `おばさん@「そう？　…じゃあ、お願いしましょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff Lady@❝Really? ...Thanks a lot.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Seems like things will work out somehow for dinner.

MESSAGE.JP: これで夕食も何とかなりそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Seems like things will work out somehow for dinner.
MESSAGE.Translation: We'd finally gathered together all we needed thanks to the staff lady's help.

MESSAGE.JP: おばさんの指示で、食材も揃えることが出来た。
MESSAGE.EN: We'd finally gathered together all we needed thanks to the staff lady's help.
MESSAGE.Translation: There was a separate fridge which was used for storing delivered foods.

MESSAGE.JP: 配達された食材を入れておく冷蔵庫が別にあったのだ。
MESSAGE.EN: There was a separate fridge which was used for storing delivered foods.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝Cut those vegetables for salad, and use tofu and seaweed for miso soup.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `おばさん@「野菜は適当に切ってサラダに、おみそ汁はお豆腐とワカメを使ってちょうだい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff Lady@❝Cut those vegetables for salad, and use tofu and seaweed for miso soup.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: With curry as the main dish, we were building an all-around well-balanced menu.

MESSAGE.JP: カレーを軸に、バランスのいい献立が出来上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: With curry as the main dish, we were building an all-around well-balanced menu.
MESSAGE.Translation: We divided the work amongst ourselves and began to work.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕たちも手分けをして各料理に取り掛かった。
MESSAGE.EN: We divided the work amongst ourselves and began to work.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝There's just no end to it, no matter how much I cut...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いくら切っても終わらねえな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝There's just no end to it, no matter how much I cut...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato muttered while preparing the curry ingredients.

MESSAGE.JP: カレーの具材を用意しながら呟く。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato muttered while preparing the curry ingredients.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I may as well try a more effective method and rip them apart with my teeth, how's that sound?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オレの歯で噛み千切っていくという効率的な方法があるがどうだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I may as well try a more effective method and rip them apart with my teeth, how's that sound?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Keep stupid questions to yourself!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あほなこと訊くなっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Keep stupid questions to yourself!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Mm, does the cafeteria staff have it this tough every day～?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん、いつもおばちゃんたちはこんな大変なことやってるのかぁ～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Mm, does the cafeteria staff have it this tough every day～?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You only realize this once you try it yourself. I somehow feel so bad now for leaving any leftovers.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やってみるとわかるね。なんだか、これを残したりするのはすごく悪いことだって思うよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You only realize this once you try it yourself. I somehow feel so bad now for leaving any leftovers.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝That's right. It's pretty tough on us, but the same goes for you as well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `おばさん@「そうね。大変だけど、それはあなたたちも一緒でしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff Lady@❝That's right. It's pretty tough on us, but the same goes for you as well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Fue?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ふえ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Fue?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝Preparing meals is our job. Your job is studying and being active, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `おばさん@「私たちはご飯を作るのが仕事。あなたたちは勉強や運動がお仕事よね？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff Lady@❝Preparing meals is our job. Your job is studying and being active, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Staff Lady@❝Nothing makes me as happy as you eating up and doing your best in studying or playing sports.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `おばさん@「たくさん食べて、一生懸命勉強や運動してくれるなら、私はそれが一番嬉しいわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Staff Lady@❝Nothing makes me as happy as you eating up and doing your best in studying or playing sports.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm so full of admiration for you, ma'am...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「惚れそうだぜ、おばちゃん…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm so full of admiration for you, ma'am...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: We barely made it in time; by the time we finished preparing the meals, there were already people taking their seats in the cafeteria.

MESSAGE.JP: 時間ギリギリ、すでに何人かの生徒が席につき始めている頃、夕食のメニューがすべて完成する。
MESSAGE.EN: We barely made it in time; by the time we finished preparing the meals, there were already people taking their seats in the cafeteria.
MESSAGE.Translation: Komari-san and Kurugaya-san, who had helped us out, went ahead and started eating.

MESSAGE.JP: 手伝ってもらった小毬さんと来ヶ谷さんには、先に夕食を食べてもらうことにした。
MESSAGE.EN: Komari-san and Kurugaya-san, who had helped us out, went ahead and started eating.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'm going back to my room for now～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃあ一度部屋に戻るよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'm going back to my room for now～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Likewise.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「同じくだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Likewise.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'll come to help later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「後でまた手伝いにくるね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'll come to help later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: They went back to the girls' dorm together.

MESSAGE.JP: ふたりは女子寮へ戻っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: They went back to the girls' dorm together.
MESSAGE.Translation: All that's left was to put things back in order.

MESSAGE.JP: さて、後は配膳だ。
MESSAGE.EN: All that's left was to put things back in order.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝All right, now...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よし、じゃあ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝All right, now...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Kyousuke's voice suddenly grew distant.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介の指示の声が、ふと遠くなる。
MESSAGE.EN: Kyousuke's voice suddenly grew distant.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, here it comes.

MESSAGE.JP: あ、くる。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, here it comes.
MESSAGE.Translation: As abruptly as ever, it happened once again...

MESSAGE.JP: それはいつものように、唐突にやってきて…
MESSAGE.EN: As abruptly as ever, it happened once again...
MESSAGE.Translation: My contact point with this world... was severed.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕とこの世界との接点を…断つ。
MESSAGE.EN: My contact point with this world... was severed.
MESSAGE.Translation: The world before my eyes swayed, and I could hear a loud thump as darkness came upon me.

MESSAGE.JP: ぐらりと景色が揺れて、がしゃんと音がして、そして真の闇が訪れた。
MESSAGE.EN: The world before my eyes swayed, and I could hear a loud thump as darkness came upon me.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Are you awake?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「起きたか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Are you awake?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: My vision was blurry, but I understood that Rin was right beside me.

MESSAGE.JP: ピントがうまく合わないが、鈴がすぐ近くにいるのがわかる。
MESSAGE.EN: My vision was blurry, but I understood that Rin was right beside me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stretched out my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: I stretched out my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: And she held onto it.

MESSAGE.JP: その手がつかまれる。
MESSAGE.EN: And she held onto it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her hand was somehow different from Kyousuke's, smoother.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の手は、恭介のそれなんかと違い、つるつるしている。
MESSAGE.EN: Her hand was somehow different from Kyousuke's, smoother.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What about dinner prep...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「晩ご飯の準備は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What about dinner prep...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's okay, don't worry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「大丈夫、心配ない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's okay, don't worry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: As small as her hand was... at that time it seemed the most reliable thing in the world to me.

MESSAGE.JP: こんなに小さい手なのに…今は頼もしく思えた。
MESSAGE.EN: As small as her hand was... at that time it seemed the most reliable thing in the world to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You can rest for now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹はまだ休んでいろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You can rest for now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Are you awake?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「起きたか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Are you awake?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: My vision was blurry, but I understood that Kyousuke was right beside me.

MESSAGE.JP: ピントがうまく合わないが、恭介がすぐ近くにいるのがわかる。
MESSAGE.EN: My vision was blurry, but I understood that Kyousuke was right beside me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stretched out my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: I stretched out my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: And he held onto it.

MESSAGE.JP: その手がつかまれる。
MESSAGE.EN: And he held onto it.
MESSAGE.Translation: His hand was somehow different from Masato's, softer.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介の手は、真人のそれなんかと違い、しなやかだ。
MESSAGE.EN: His hand was somehow different from Masato's, softer.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What about dinner prep...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「晩ご飯の準備は…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What about dinner prep...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's okay, everything went well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「大丈夫だ、うまくやったさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's okay, everything went well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I thought so...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「さすがだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I thought so...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: It was something that happened all the time, so I didn't apologize.

MESSAGE.JP: いつものことだから、僕はもうごめんとも謝らなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was something that happened all the time, so I didn't apologize.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since it was Kyousuke and everyone else, I didn't feel like a nuisance.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介たちが相手なら、そんな引け目すら感じない。
MESSAGE.EN: Since it was Kyousuke and everyone else, I didn't feel like a nuisance.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were reliable.

MESSAGE.JP: 頼れるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: They were reliable.
MESSAGE.Translation: After practice was over, we began cleaning the place up together.

MESSAGE.JP: 練習が終わり、みんなで片付けを始める。
MESSAGE.EN: After practice was over, we began cleaning the place up together.
MESSAGE.Translation: I was raking the field with Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕と真人のふたりで、グラウンドにトンボを掛ける事にした。
MESSAGE.EN: I was raking the field with Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It became beautiful like my muscles. Don't step on it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オレの筋肉のように美しくなったな。そっち踏むなよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It became beautiful like my muscles. Don't step on it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Mm? What'd you say?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ん？　なんだって？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Mm? What'd you say?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She strode toward Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: ずかずかと真人の方に歩み寄る。
MESSAGE.EN: She strode toward Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Uooooh! My muscles!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うおおぉぉおぉーっ!!　オレの筋肉がぁあぁーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Uooooh! My muscles!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, we can get it back to how it was in no time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「まあ、それくらいならすぐ掛けなおすよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, we can get it back to how it was in no time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: ...And.

MESSAGE.EN: ...And.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝That's not the problem...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そういう問題じゃ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝That's not the problem...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Suddenly, Masato's voice grew distant.

MESSAGE.JP: ふと、真人の声が遠くなる。
MESSAGE.EN: Suddenly, Masato's voice grew distant.
MESSAGE.Translation: Ah, here it comes.

MESSAGE.JP: あ、くる。
MESSAGE.EN: Ah, here it comes.
MESSAGE.Translation: As abruptly as ever, it happened once again...

MESSAGE.JP: それはいつものように、唐突にやってきて…
MESSAGE.EN: As abruptly as ever, it happened once again...
MESSAGE.Translation: My contact point with this world... was severed.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕とこの世界との接点を…断つ。
MESSAGE.EN: My contact point with this world... was severed.
MESSAGE.Translation: The world before my eyes swayed, and I could hear a loud thump as darkness came upon me.

MESSAGE.JP: ぐらりと景色が揺れて、がしゃんと音がして、そして真の闇が訪れた。
MESSAGE.EN: The world before my eyes swayed, and I could hear a loud thump as darkness came upon me.

MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝You awake?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「起きた？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝You awake?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: My eyes hadn't come into focus, so I couldn't tell who it was...

MESSAGE.JP: ピントがうまく合わず、誰かよくわからない…。
MESSAGE.EN: My eyes hadn't come into focus, so I couldn't tell who it was...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝It's okay. Nothing to worry about.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「大丈夫よ。何も心配することはないわ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝It's okay. Nothing to worry about.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Eh? Tokido-san!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　朱鷺戸さん!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Eh? Tokido-san!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: When I noticed her sitting on the edge of the bed, I jumped up.

MESSAGE.JP: ベッドの端に腰掛ける人物に気づいて、僕は飛び起きる。
MESSAGE.EN: When I noticed her sitting on the edge of the bed, I jumped up.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝What's with that attitude? I was keeping watch over you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「なによ、その態度。監視し続けてあげたのよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝What's with that attitude? I was keeping watch over you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah but... I wasn't expecting you to be looking after me...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうだけど…ここで朱鷺戸さんに介抱されるとは意外で…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah but... I wasn't expecting you to be looking after me...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It'd usually be my childhood friend Kyousuke who would do it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いつもは僕の幼なじみ…恭介がそういう役回りだから…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It'd usually be my childhood friend Kyousuke who would do it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Do you love him that much? Even though he's a man?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「あなた、その人のことがそんなに好きなの？　男なのに？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Do you love him that much? Even though he's a man?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I guess I kinda love him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やや好き」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I guess I kinda love him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I love him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「好き」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I love him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I really love him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「大好き」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I really love him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Why are they all love?!

MESSAGE.JP: って、全部、好きなんじゃん！
MESSAGE.EN: Why are they all love?!
MESSAGE.Translation: Why didn't I come up with a harmless option like ❛none of the above❜!?

MESSAGE.JP: どうして僕の中には、『どっちでもない』という当たりさわりのない選択肢がないんだ!?
MESSAGE.EN: Why didn't I come up with a harmless option like ❛none of the above❜!?
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, it's not that I love him. I look up to and rely on him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、そういう好きじゃなく、憧れる、とか頼れる、みたいなさっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, it's not that I love him. I look up to and rely on him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You could say he's a hero in my eyes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ともかく、僕にとってはヒーローのような存在なんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You could say he's a hero in my eyes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Hmph, now I want to have a bout with him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「ふぅん、一度お手合わせ願いたいものね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Hmph, now I want to have a bout with him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Who do you think would win?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「どっちが勝つかしら？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Who do you think would win?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Probably Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「やや恭介」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Probably Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Definitely Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「絶対恭介」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Definitely Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: All of the options are basically the same thing again!!

MESSAGE.JP: って、またも振り幅が一方的な選択肢しかない!!
MESSAGE.EN: All of the options are basically the same thing again!!
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝I'm amazed at how much you adore him...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「呆れるぐらい、その人に心酔してるのね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝I'm amazed at how much you adore him...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝No, well... that's how it is...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、まあ…そうだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝No, well... that's how it is...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Hmph.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「ふぅん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Hmph.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Well, whatever.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「ま、いっか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Well, whatever.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She suddenly stood up.

MESSAGE.JP: 朱鷺戸さんはひょいと立ち上がる。
MESSAGE.EN: She suddenly stood up.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝You should rest until nightfall. But you shouldn't sleep, okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「あなたは夜まで休んでなさい。もちろん、寝ちゃダメよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝You should rest until nightfall. But you shouldn't sleep, okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah, okay.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、わかってるよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah, okay.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Also, about the wandering around and battling that you do. No more of that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「あと、あんたたち、さすらってバトルとかしてたでしょ。もう付き合っちゃ駄目よ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Also, about the wandering around and battling that you do. No more of that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What? Why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「え？　どうして？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What? Why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝If you walk around by yourself, you're going to get caught again.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「ひとりきりで歩いて回っていたら、また捕まっちゃうからに決まってるじゃない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝If you walk around by yourself, you're going to get caught again.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, you're right...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ああ、その通りだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, you're right...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She spared me from getting tortured again...

MESSAGE.JP: また拷問を受けるなんて勘弁だ…。
MESSAGE.EN: She spared me from getting tortured again...
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll abstain from participating in battles for a while...

MESSAGE.JP: しばらく、バトルには参加せずにおこう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll abstain from participating in battles for a while...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Well, I'm gonna go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「じゃ、いくわよ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Well, I'm gonna go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Tokido@❝Sure.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `朱鷺戸@「うんっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Tokido@❝Sure.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She left the room, leaving behind a smile and the scent of her hair.

MESSAGE.JP: 最後に髪の香りと笑顔を残して、部屋を出て行った。
MESSAGE.EN: She left the room, leaving behind a smile and the scent of her hair.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Voice@❝Are you awake?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `声@「起きたか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Voice@❝Are you awake?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: My vision was blurry, but I understood that Rin was right beside me.

MESSAGE.JP: ピントがうまく合わないが、鈴がすぐ近くにいるのがわかる。
MESSAGE.EN: My vision was blurry, but I understood that Rin was right beside me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stretched out my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: I stretched out my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: And she held onto it.

MESSAGE.JP: その手がつかまれる。
MESSAGE.EN: And she held onto it.
MESSAGE.Translation: Her hand was somehow different from Kyousuke's, smoother.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴の手は、恭介のそれなんかと違い、つるつるしている。
MESSAGE.EN: Her hand was somehow different from Kyousuke's, smoother.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝You can rest for now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹はまだ休んでいろ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝You can rest for now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: As small as her hand was... at that time it seemed the most reliable thing in the world to me.

MESSAGE.JP: こんなに小さい手なのに…今は頼もしく思えた。
MESSAGE.EN: As small as her hand was... at that time it seemed the most reliable thing in the world to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Are you awake?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「起きたか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Are you awake?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: My vision was blurry, but I understood that Kyousuke was right beside me.

MESSAGE.JP: ピントがうまく合わないが、恭介がすぐ近くにいるのがわかる。
MESSAGE.EN: My vision was blurry, but I understood that Kyousuke was right beside me.
MESSAGE.Translation: I stretched out my hand.

MESSAGE.JP: 手を伸ばす。
MESSAGE.EN: I stretched out my hand.
MESSAGE.Translation: And he held onto it.

MESSAGE.JP: その手がつかまれる。
MESSAGE.EN: And he held onto it.
MESSAGE.Translation: His hand was somehow different from Masato's, softer.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介の手は、真人のそれなんかと違い、しなやかだ。
MESSAGE.EN: His hand was somehow different from Masato's, softer.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's okay, you can rest for now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「大丈夫だ、このまま休んでおけばいい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's okay, you can rest for now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: It was something that happened all the time, so I didn't apologize.

MESSAGE.JP: いつものことだから、僕はもうごめんとも謝らなかった。
MESSAGE.EN: It was something that happened all the time, so I didn't apologize.
MESSAGE.Translation: Since it was Kyousuke and everyone else, I didn't feel like a nuisance.

MESSAGE.JP: 恭介たちが相手なら、そんな引け目すら感じない。
MESSAGE.EN: Since it was Kyousuke and everyone else, I didn't feel like a nuisance.
MESSAGE.Translation: They were reliable.

MESSAGE.JP: 頼れるんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: They were reliable.
MESSAGE.Translation: I rested for a while, and left my room to have dinner.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は少し休んだ後、夕飯を食べに部屋を出る。
MESSAGE.EN: I rested for a while, and left my room to have dinner.
MESSAGE.Translation: Whether he had been waiting for me or was just returning from somewhere, I ran into Masato.

MESSAGE.JP: 待っていたのか、何かの帰りか、真人がいた。
MESSAGE.EN: Whether he had been waiting for me or was just returning from somewhere, I ran into Masato.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Are you going to eat? I'll go with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「飯これからか？　つき合うぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Are you going to eat? I'll go with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I definitely shouldn't be alone.

MESSAGE.JP: 確かに…ひとりきりで居るのはまずい。
MESSAGE.EN: I definitely shouldn't be alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: I'll have him come along.

MESSAGE.JP: 付き合ってもらおう。
MESSAGE.EN: I'll have him come along.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, thanks. I'm counting on you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「じゃ、ごめん。頼むよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, thanks. I'm counting on you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's fine. I can have some cutlet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いいってことよ。オレはカツでもつついてるからよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's fine. I can have some cutlet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝You make it sound like a snack...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「おやつ感覚なんだね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝You make it sound like a snack...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'd be super happy if you treated me to some.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「それをおごってくれるとすげぇ嬉しいんだが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'd be super happy if you treated me to some.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I nodded a yes. He can act as a bodyguard.

MESSAGE.JP: ボディガード代わりだ。いいよ、と僕は頷く。
MESSAGE.EN: I nodded a yes. He can act as a bodyguard.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Yahoo! Cutlet! Cutlet!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「いゃっほぅ！　カツカツ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Yahoo! Cutlet! Cutlet!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: In high spirits, he pushed me along.

MESSAGE.JP: 喜び勇んで僕の背中を押しつつ、歩き出した。
MESSAGE.EN: In high spirits, he pushed me along.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The breeze feels great.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「風が涼しくて気持ちいいね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The breeze feels great.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I don't really care.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「んなことどーでもいいぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I don't really care.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Masato apparently wasn't the type to talk about such things.

MESSAGE.JP: 真人とは風情について語り合えないようだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Masato apparently wasn't the type to talk about such things.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just as I stepped outside the dorm, I saw familiar people standing near the bench.

MESSAGE.JP: 寮の玄関から外に目をやったとき、近くのベンチあたりで見知った顔を見つけた。
MESSAGE.EN: Just as I stepped outside the dorm, I saw familiar people standing near the bench.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's Rin and Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴とクドだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's Rin and Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: It struck me that they were an unusual pairing.

MESSAGE.JP: 少し珍しい組み合わせのような気がした。
MESSAGE.EN: It struck me that they were an unusual pairing.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I don't really care.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「んなことどーでもいいぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I don't really care.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Hey... that's the same thing he said earlier.

MESSAGE.JP: あれ…さっきと同じセリフだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Hey... that's the same thing he said earlier.
MESSAGE.Translation: I think I should be angry...

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は恐るべきことを考える…。
MESSAGE.EN: I think I should be angry...
MESSAGE.Translation: Is Masato only interested in the cutlet I promised him...?

MESSAGE.JP: もしかして真人は、今から食べるカツにしか興味を持っていないのでは…？
MESSAGE.EN: Is Masato only interested in the cutlet I promised him...?
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝There's a pop quiz tomorrow.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「明日、隠しテストがあるそうだよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝There's a pop quiz tomorrow.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I don't really care.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「んなことどーでもいいぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I don't really care.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Yup... cutlet is the only thing on his mind.

MESSAGE.JP: みろ…。カツのことしか頭にない。
MESSAGE.EN: Yup... cutlet is the only thing on his mind.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Masato, say cutlet...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「真人、カツって言ってみて…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Masato, say cutlet...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Cutlet! Cutlet!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「カツカツ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Cutlet! Cutlet!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What about the pop quiz tomorrow?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「明日の隠しテストはどうする？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What about the pop quiz tomorrow?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I don't really care.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「んなことどーでもいいぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I don't really care.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: He's obviously only thinking about cutlet!

MESSAGE.JP: 明らかにカツのことしか考えていない!!
MESSAGE.EN: He's obviously only thinking about cutlet!
MESSAGE.Translation: I got the feeling that if I was abducted in front of him he'd just go eat alone.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕が目の前でさらわれようが、ひとりでカツを食べていそうだ。
MESSAGE.EN: I got the feeling that if I was abducted in front of him he'd just go eat alone.
MESSAGE.Translation: No, then I wouldn't be able to pay. He'll protect me...

MESSAGE.JP: いや、その支払いは僕なわけだから、僕は守ってくれるか…。
MESSAGE.EN: No, then I wouldn't be able to pay. He'll protect me...
MESSAGE.Translation: Is that what it means to be... friends? Best friends?

MESSAGE.JP: って、それは…友達なのか？　親友なのか？
MESSAGE.EN: Is that what it means to be... friends? Best friends?
MESSAGE.Translation: Would he protect me if there was no cutlet...?

MESSAGE.JP: カツなしには守ってもらえない…？
MESSAGE.EN: Would he protect me if there was no cutlet...?
MESSAGE.Translation: This is raising some serious doubts in my mind, but I shouldn't think about it too hard...

MESSAGE.JP: 嫌な疑問がもたげてくるが、深く考えないことにしよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: This is raising some serious doubts in my mind, but I shouldn't think about it too hard...
MESSAGE.Translation: And so I went with Masato to have a late dinner.

MESSAGE.JP: そうして、真人に付き合ってもらい、遅い夕飯を食べることに。
MESSAGE.EN: And so I went with Masato to have a late dinner.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝That's okay. I can handle that much by myself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いいよ、それぐらい。ひとりで大丈夫だから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝That's okay. I can handle that much by myself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Okay. I'll see you later then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そっか。じゃ、後でな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Okay. I'll see you later then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: He went into the room.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕と入れ替わりに部屋へ入っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: He went into the room.
MESSAGE.Translation: The wind was refreshing.

MESSAGE.JP: 風が涼しい。
MESSAGE.EN: The wind was refreshing.
MESSAGE.Translation: This was the best time to enjoy the evening breeze.

MESSAGE.JP: 夕涼みにはちょうどいい時間だ。
MESSAGE.EN: This was the best time to enjoy the evening breeze.
MESSAGE.Translation: Just as I stepped outside the dorm, I saw familiar people standing near the bench.

MESSAGE.JP: 寮の玄関から外に目をやったとき、近くのベンチあたりで見知った顔を見つけた。
MESSAGE.EN: Just as I stepped outside the dorm, I saw familiar people standing near the bench.
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin and Kud.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴とクドだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin and Kud.
MESSAGE.Translation: It was unusual to see them together, so I approached them.

MESSAGE.JP: 少し珍しい組み合わせのような気がして、僕はそちらに足を向けた。
MESSAGE.EN: It was unusual to see them together, so I approached them.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What're you doing?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「二人とも何してるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What're you doing?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Riki, you okay now?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「理樹か、大丈夫か？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Riki, you okay now?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I'm used to this, so I'm fine.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「慣れてるから、平気だよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I'm used to this, so I'm fine.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝So, what're you up to?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「で、何をしてたって？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝So, what're you up to?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Nothing in particular.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「特に何もしてない」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Nothing in particular.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Good evening, Naoe-san.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「こんにちは、直枝さん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Good evening, Naoe-san.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Rin was holding a cat in her arms.

MESSAGE.JP: 何もしてない、と言ったにも関わらず鈴は猫を抱いていた。
MESSAGE.EN: Rin was holding a cat in her arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: Its name was... Audrey, I think.

MESSAGE.JP: こいつの名前はなんだっただろう…多分オードリーだ。
MESSAGE.EN: Its name was... Audrey, I think.
MESSAGE.Translation: Many more cats were rubbing against her legs, seeking her attention and purring.

MESSAGE.JP: そんな鈴の足下には猫がわらわらといて、構ってほしそうにみゃーみゃーと鳴き続けている。
MESSAGE.EN: Many more cats were rubbing against her legs, seeking her attention and purring.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you like cats, Kud?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「クドは猫、好き？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you like cats, Kud?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I love them. But there's another animal I like even more.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「好きですー。でも、もっと好きな動物はいますけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I love them. But there's another animal I like even more.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see, what's that? Actually, I think I know the answer already.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうなんだ、何？ってわかるような気もするけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see, what's that? Actually, I think I know the answer already.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Really? Try to guess then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうですか？　では当ててみてくださいー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Really? Try to guess then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Dogs.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「犬」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Dogs.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝What a quick answer! And absolutely correct too!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「即答!?　しかも正解ですーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝What a quick answer! And absolutely correct too!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Well, yeah, thanks...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、まぁ、なんとなく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Well, yeah, thanks...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Looking at her, it seemed like she belonged to the same species.

MESSAGE.JP: 本人よく見たら同属っぽいし。
MESSAGE.EN: Looking at her, it seemed like she belonged to the same species.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Do you own a dog?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「犬は飼ってないの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Do you own a dog?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝At home, oh, I mean at my grandpa's place, I'm keeping a lot of them there.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「本宅、あ、おじい様の家という意味ですよ、本宅にはたくさんいます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝At home, oh, I mean at my grandpa's place, I'm keeping a lot of them there.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Hee, really...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「へぇそうなんだ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Hee, really...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝My best friends should be around somewhere.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「私の一番の友達さんはこの敷地内にいるみたいなんですけど」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝My best friends should be around somewhere.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I haven't met them yet.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「まだ会ってません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I haven't met them yet.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What do you mean?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「と、いうと？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What do you mean?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Strelka and Belka are at work I think.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ストレルカとヴェルカはお仕事だと思います」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Strelka and Belka are at work I think.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝At work...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「仕事…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝At work...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝They may be keeping guard in the daytime and at night... If they're at work, I shouldn't bother them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「昼か夜の警備をしているんじゃないかと…お仕事してるなら、邪魔しちゃいけませんから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝They may be keeping guard in the daytime and at night... If they're at work, I shouldn't bother them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Those two were clearly names of watchdogs.

MESSAGE.JP: 名前をあげた二匹は番犬か何かなのだろう。
MESSAGE.EN: Those two were clearly names of watchdogs.
MESSAGE.Translation: Come to think of it, I'd heard something about disciplinary committee members getting themselves reliable partners for patrolling around the girls' dorm...

MESSAGE.JP: そういえば、女子寮の周りを風紀委員がパトロールするときに、頼もしい相棒がつくようになったとかどうとか…聞いたような。
MESSAGE.EN: Come to think of it, I'd heard something about disciplinary committee members getting themselves reliable partners for patrolling around the girls' dorm...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I have met them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あたしは見たことがある」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I have met them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, I see. If you see them again, please tell them that Kud wants to meet them.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、そうなんですか。出会ったらクドが会いたがっていたと伝えてほしいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, I see. If you see them again, please tell them that Kud wants to meet them.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝All right. Do they eat Mon Petit?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「わかった。モンペチ、食べる？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝All right. Do they eat Mon Petit?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I wonder... I don't think they have any strong preferences...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「どうでしょうか…わりかし好き嫌いは無かったはずですけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I wonder... I don't think they have any strong preferences...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Are you going to convey it to them through Mon Petit, Rin...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「モンペチで伝えるつもりなんだ、鈴…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Are you going to convey it to them through Mon Petit, Rin...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Translation Mon Petit.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ホンヤクモンペチ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Translation Mon Petit.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She said while taking out a can of cat food.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴がキャットフードの缶詰を上着のポケットから出しながら言う。
MESSAGE.EN: She said while taking out a can of cat food.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It won't translate anything.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「しないから翻訳してくれないから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It won't translate anything.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Well, I'm off then.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「じゃ、そろそろ行く」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Well, I'm off then.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Ah, Rin-san, bye bye.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あ、はい。鈴さん、ばいばいです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Ah, Rin-san, bye bye.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She walked away holding the cat in her arms.

MESSAGE.JP: 鈴は猫を抱えたまま、歩き去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: She walked away holding the cat in her arms.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Where's she going, carrying a cat?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴、猫抱えたまま、どこへ行くんだろう？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Where's she going, carrying a cat?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Probably to see a vet?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「多分獣医さんとこではないでしょうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Probably to see a vet?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝The cat had hurt its leg.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あの猫さん、足怪我してましたから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝The cat had hurt its leg.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Oh, I see.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、そうなんだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Oh, I see.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Rin-san couldn't get near the cat no matter what, and she didn't know what to do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「なかなか近寄ってくれなくて鈴さんが困ってたんですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Rin-san couldn't get near the cat no matter what, and she didn't know what to do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And that's when I happened to pass by.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そこを私が通りかかって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And that's when I happened to pass by.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And fast as lightning, you caught it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ばし！　と猫を捕まえた、とか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And fast as lightning, you caught it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝No, no.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「いえいえ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝No, no.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She waved her hands in denial.

MESSAGE.JP: クドはパタパタと手を振った。
MESSAGE.EN: She waved her hands in denial.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I exploited a trait all cats share.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「猫さんの習性を利用したんです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I exploited a trait all cats share.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝This is how you do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「こうやって、ですね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝This is how you do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She took a paper bag that lay on the bench.

MESSAGE.JP: クドはベンチに置かれたままになっている紙袋を膨らませた。
MESSAGE.EN: She took a paper bag that lay on the bench.
MESSAGE.Translation: And placed it underneath it.

MESSAGE.JP: それからベンチの下に入れる。
MESSAGE.EN: And placed it underneath it.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'll leave it here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「置いておきます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'll leave it here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「それで？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: A gust of wind blew, and the paper bag made a rustling sound.

MESSAGE.JP: 風が吹いて、がさがさ、と紙袋が音を立てた。
MESSAGE.EN: A gust of wind blew, and the paper bag made a rustling sound.
MESSAGE.Translation: At that instant.

MESSAGE.JP: その瞬間。
MESSAGE.EN: At that instant.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Gaza*gaza*gaza*!

MESSAGE.JP: がさがさがさがさっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Gaza*gaza*gaza*!
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And there you have it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「というわけです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And there you have it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I don't really get it...

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、なにがというわけかわかんないよ…
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I don't really get it...
MESSAGE.Translation: Wh-, wait, a cat just went inside the bag!❞

MESSAGE.JP: ってうわ！　猫が紙袋に入ってるっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: Wh-, wait, a cat just went inside the bag!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Cats love paper bags and tote bags.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「猫さんは紙袋とかトートバッグ好きですから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Cats love paper bags and tote bags.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝And why is that? Because they like cramped places?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうしてなんだろう？　狭いところが好きだから？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝And why is that? Because they like cramped places?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Um... Maybe they think that it's prey?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「えーと、獲物さんがいそうだから、でしょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Um... Maybe they think that it's prey?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And also, when it makes a rustling sound, they can't help but slip inside.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「それにがさごそ音がすると、入っちゃわないではいられないらしいのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And also, when it makes a rustling sound, they can't help but slip inside.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝And that's how we caught the injured cat.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「こうやって怪我してる猫さんを捕まえたのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝And that's how we caught the injured cat.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She nodded emphatically.

MESSAGE.JP: クドはうむ、と頷いた。
MESSAGE.EN: She nodded emphatically.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝...I see. So that's why you were with Rin?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「…なるほど。それで鈴と一緒にいたのか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝...I see. So that's why you were with Rin?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I could show my gratitude to her for the early spring with this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「これで春先のお礼が一つ出来ましたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I could show my gratitude to her for the early spring with this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: She looked delighted.

MESSAGE.JP: クドは嬉しそうだった。
MESSAGE.EN: She looked delighted.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Well, I've got to go too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「さて、私も行かなくては、です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Well, I've got to go too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Okay, see you, Kud.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「あ、うん。またね、クド」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Okay, see you, Kud.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Yes, bye-bye, si- yu- reita-.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「はいです。ばいばいです、しーゆーれいた～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Yes, bye-bye, si- yu- reita-.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Her mantle swayed about as she left.

MESSAGE.JP: クドはマントを翻して去っていった。
MESSAGE.EN: Her mantle swayed about as she left.
MESSAGE.Translation: I saw her off.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は見送る。
MESSAGE.EN: I saw her off.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝A cat and a dog, huh...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「猫と犬、か」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝A cat and a dog, huh...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: That really was how Rin and Kud appeared to me.

MESSAGE.JP: 口にしてみて、それはまるで鈴とクドのことだよな、と僕は思ったのだった。
MESSAGE.EN: That really was how Rin and Kud appeared to me.
MESSAGE.Translation: *Gauu*.

MESSAGE.JP: ぐーっ。
MESSAGE.EN: *Gauu*.
MESSAGE.Translation: My stomach growled loudly.

MESSAGE.JP: 腹が大きな音を立てる。
MESSAGE.EN: My stomach growled loudly.
MESSAGE.Translation: I should go grab some dinner soon...

MESSAGE.JP: とっとと夕食を済ませてこよう…。
MESSAGE.EN: I should go grab some dinner soon...
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝The tension's running high now!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よぅし、テンション上がってきたな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝The tension's running high now!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Let's finish up today with a blast!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「今日もいっちょやるかっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Let's finish up today with a blast!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝I see...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そうか…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝I see...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: My normal nights begin again today.

MESSAGE.JP: 今日からいつもの夜に戻ったんだ。
MESSAGE.EN: My normal nights begin again today.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「恭介っ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Without thinking, I hugged Kyousuke who had appeared in my room.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は思わず、部屋に現れた恭介に抱きついてしまう。
MESSAGE.EN: Without thinking, I hugged Kyousuke who had appeared in my room.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Oh my, what's up?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おっと、なんだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Oh my, what's up?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I don't know what's going on, but you're such a softie.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「何があったかしらないが、まったく甘ちゃんだなあ、おまえは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I don't know what's going on, but you're such a softie.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: He was rubbing my head back and forth, but it felt good.

MESSAGE.JP: ぐりぐりと頭を手でこねくり回されるが、それも気持ちいい。
MESSAGE.EN: He was rubbing my head back and forth, but it felt good.
MESSAGE.Translation: I wanted him to keep doing it forever, but everyone was watching so I pulled away.

MESSAGE.JP: ずっとそうしてほしかったぐらいだけど、みんなの目もあったので、僕は恭介から離れた。
MESSAGE.EN: I wanted him to keep doing it forever, but everyone was watching so I pulled away.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What have you guys been up to at night?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「夜はどうしてたの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What have you guys been up to at night?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I asked everyone.

MESSAGE.JP: みんなに訊いてみる。
MESSAGE.EN: I asked everyone.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Using Rin to find new members.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴を使って、メンバー探し」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Using Rin to find new members.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It hasn't been going well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「まったく上手くいってないがな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It hasn't been going well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Where is she?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「鈴はどこ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Where is she?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝She's already standing by in front of the dorm.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「すでに寮の前でスタンバらせてる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝She's already standing by in front of the dorm.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Why?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「どうして？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Why?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝She has a different mission today.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「今日は違うミッションに挑ませる」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝She has a different mission today.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, can you hear me? Over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴、聞こえるか、オーバー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, can you hear me? Over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Don't say over, over.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『オーバー言うな、オーバー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Don't say over, over.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Starting today the mission's going to change.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「本日よりミッションを変更する」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Starting today the mission's going to change.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rumor has it there's a mysterious lifeform roaming the school building at night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「夜の校舎に謎の生命体が潜んでいるという噂だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rumor has it there's a mysterious lifeform roaming the school building at night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Among the victims were teachers on night duty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「宿直の教師にも被害者が出ている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Among the victims were teachers on night duty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: In the school building at night...?

MESSAGE.JP: 夜の校舎だって…？
MESSAGE.EN: In the school building at night...?
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin... you must get rid of that dangerous creature.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴…その危険生物を駆逐せよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin... you must get rid of that dangerous creature.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Absolutely not!!!!!!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ぜったいだめえぇぇぇーーーっ!!」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Absolutely not!!!!!!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: I yelled as loud as I could.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は力の限り叫んでいた。
MESSAGE.EN: I yelled as loud as I could.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You're so loud, what's with you all the sudden.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うるせーな、なんだよ、いきなり」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You're so loud, what's with you all the sudden.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝The school building is dangerous at night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「夜の校舎は危険だっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝The school building is dangerous at night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Do you know something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「何か知ってるのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Do you know something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Yeah I do... but you wouldn't believe me if I told you, so I'm not going to...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うん、知ってる…でも言っても信じてもらえそうもないから言わないけど…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Yeah I do... but you wouldn't believe me if I told you, so I'm not going to...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝It's definitely dangerous, so you can't let her go. That's all I'll say.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「絶対に危ないから、鈴はいかしちゃ駄目だ。それだけは言わせて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝It's definitely dangerous, so you can't let her go. That's all I'll say.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Anyway, it's dangerous at night. Rin, hurry back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「そもそも夜の時点で危ないよ、鈴、早く戻ってきて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Anyway, it's dangerous at night. Rin, hurry back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[...Is it okay?]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『…いいのか？』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[...Is it okay?]
MESSAGE.Translation: I looked Kyousuke dead in the eyes.

MESSAGE.JP: 僕は恭介の目を…真剣に見つめた。
MESSAGE.EN: I looked Kyousuke dead in the eyes.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝...Yeah. Come back.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「…ああ。戻ってこい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝...Yeah. Come back.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Roger.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『了解』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Roger.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Thank you, Kyousuke.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「ありがとう、恭介」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Thank you, Kyousuke.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I'm the one who should be saying thanks. You care about Rin more than anyone. Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「礼を言うのはこっちだ。おまえは鈴のことを誰よりも大事に思ってくれてる。ありがとな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I'm the one who should be saying thanks. You care about Rin more than anyone. Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Haha, no way... you care about her just as much as I do.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「はは、そんな…鈴を大切に思う気持ちは恭介も一緒でしょ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Haha, no way... you care about her just as much as I do.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, you're right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ああ、そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yeah, you're right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Before long Rin was back.

MESSAGE.JP: ほどなくして、鈴が戻ってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Before long Rin was back.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's going on? Is there no mission today?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「どうした、今日はミッションはなしか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's going on? Is there no mission today?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝No, there is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いや、あるさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝No, there is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Come, Rin. I'll be your opponent.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「来い、鈴。俺が相手だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Come, Rin. I'll be your opponent.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Are you ready? Now, surpass your brother!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「本気でいくぜ？　さあ、兄を越えてみせろ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Are you ready? Now, surpass your brother!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Ah, I take back what I said! There's no way she can win bare-handed. You don't care about her at all!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわぁ、前言撤回！　素手でなんて勝ち目ないから！　ぜんぜん鈴を大事にしてませんから！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Ah, I take back what I said! There's no way she can win bare-handed. You don't care about her at all!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝I believe in sink or swim.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「俺は谷に突き落とす派なもんでな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝I believe in sink or swim.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Fuh, stupid brother... let's do this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふっ、馬鹿兄貴めが…臨むところだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Fuh, stupid brother... let's do this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Don't do it! You can't win!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「臨んじゃ駄目だよ！　勝てないから！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Don't do it! You can't win!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Well, how about it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「さぁ、どうだろうな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Well, how about it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Let's go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いくぞっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Let's go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝In this small room!?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「しかもこんな狭い部屋で!?」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝In this small room!?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: *Bam* *bam!*

MESSAGE.JP: ばきばきぃーっ！
MESSAGE.EN: *Bam* *bam!*
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Aah, my and Riki's table!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「うわぁ、理樹とオレのちゃぶ台があぁぁぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Aah, my and Riki's table!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: And so the night went on...

MESSAGE.JP: そうして夜も更けていった…。
MESSAGE.EN: And so the night went on...
MESSAGE.Translation: Once again Kyousuke came over when the night fell.

MESSAGE.JP: また夜になって恭介たちがやってくる。
MESSAGE.EN: Once again Kyousuke came over when the night fell.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Despite being a student he's quite a night person, just what you'd expect of Kyousuke, isn't it...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「学生のくせにすでに夜型とはさすが恭介としかいいようがねぇぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Despite being a student he's quite a night person, just what you'd expect of Kyousuke, isn't it...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Can it be, you're going to make Rin search for members again?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「もしかして、また鈴にメンバー探しさせるの？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Can it be, you're going to make Rin search for members again?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Of course he is.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「こいつはそのつもりだぞ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Of course he is.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: Kengo replied in a tired voice as he sat down.

MESSAGE.JP: うんざり顔で謙吾はすぐさま腰を下ろす。
MESSAGE.EN: Kengo replied in a tired voice as he sat down.
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But we've already got plenty of girls on the team, isn't it enough?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「でも、女の子もメンバー増えたし、もういいんじゃ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But we've already got plenty of girls on the team, isn't it enough?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Mm...?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「うん…？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Mm...?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Ah, now that you mention, you're right.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「あ、そういや、そうだな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Ah, now that you mention, you're right.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝But Rin's overflowing with enthusiasm and is already standing by in front of the dorm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「でも、鈴はやる気まんまんで寮の前でスタンバってるしな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝But Rin's overflowing with enthusiasm and is already standing by in front of the dorm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝But, isn't she like the only one overflowing with enthusiasm...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「いや、鈴に限って、やる気まんまんってことは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝But, isn't she like the only one overflowing with enthusiasm...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Then, let's change it to a different mission.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「じゃあ、別のミッションに変えるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Then, let's change it to a different mission.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, can you hear me? Over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴、聞こえるか、オーバー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin, can you hear me? Over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Don't say over, over.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『オーバー言うな、オーバー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Don't say over, over.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Starting today the mission's going to change.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「本日よりミッションを変更する」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Starting today the mission's going to change.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rumor has it there's a mysterious lifeform roaming the school building at night.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「夜の校舎に謎の生命体が潜んでいるという噂だ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rumor has it there's a mysterious lifeform roaming the school building at night.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Among the victims were teachers on night duty.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「宿直の教師にも被害者が出ている」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Among the victims were teachers on night duty.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝What is this...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「なんだよそれ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝What is this...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Rin... you must get rid of that dangerous creature.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「鈴…その危険生物を駆逐せよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Rin... you must get rid of that dangerous creature.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Mission Start!❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Mission Start!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[Roger, over.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『了解、オーバー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[Roger, over.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Riki@❝Whoa, Rin, that's dangerous.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `理樹@「うわ、鈴、危ないって」
MESSAGE.EN: `Riki@❝Whoa, Rin, that's dangerous.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝By the way...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ちなみにな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝By the way...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝According to the teachers who were on night duty, boiled fish cans have been disappearing in large quantities from the emergency food store.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝According to the teachers who were on night duty, boiled fish cans have been disappearing in large quantities from the emergency food store.❞

MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝If we defeat the culprit, we might obtain some.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I'll try to do something, over.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『がんばってみる、オーバー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I'll try to do something, over.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[No way, over.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『いやじゃ、オーバー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[No way, over.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Go, over.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「いけ、オーバー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Go, over.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@[I'm scared, over.]

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@『こわいわ、オーバー』
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@[I'm scared, over.]
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝By the way...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ちなみにな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝By the way...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝According to the teachers who were on night duty, boiled fish cans have been disappearing in large quantities from the emergency food store.❞
